text: The Karma Broker Developing your inner power Creation Epilogue Glossary About the Author PROLOGUE This book is being made available free of charge, so that those who have little or no money can still hear my message and make a choice regarding their spiritual freedom.
Name: Book 10

text: I will do my best to provide enough information here, to enable most people to escape this hell we call Gods creation, without the need for a workshop.
Name: Book 10

text: However, unless the individual is already quite adept with energetic forces and the astral plane, contacting the Mani-Om-Sah Institute at maniomsah.
Name: Book 10

text: com is recommended.
Name: Book 10

text: This book has not been in the hands of a publisher, nor has it been edited by anyone other than me.
Name: Book 10

text: I did not major in English literature, nor have I studied creative writing or English composition beyond one basic class in 1973; therefore, please ignore any grammatical and/or structural errors that you may come across in your reading.
Name: Book 10

text: I appreciate your patience in this regard.
Name: Book 10

text: This book represents twenty-four years of personal study and research into the esoteric aspects of the worlds spiritual and religious traditions, as well as the histories relevant to both the development and demise of such traditions.
Name: Book 10

text: It would be impossible to include all of my discoveries in just one book, especially in one as small as this one.
Name: Book 10

text: However, I think youll find that I have consolidated my notes sufficiently for the purpose of describing our situation on Earth, and explaining how we can make our escape.
Name: Book 10

text: Many of you will be angry with me; some to the point of wanting to kill me (a religious classic).
Name: Book 10

text: Keep in mind though, that I am not a satanist, nor do I claim to be a prophet, a savior, or even a guru.
Name: Book 10

text: I have formed no church, and I will never attempt to convert anyone to any philosophy.
Name: Book 10

text: I do, however, have some very important information for those who are interested, and I am making it available to all.
Name: Book 10

text: If you dont like it, simply ignore it, and ignore me as well.
Name: Book 10

text: I wont even threaten you with Gods wrath if you do.
Name: Book 10

text: Others will read this book and feel that it makes sense out of incongruities they have noticed in both life and religion.
Name: Book 10

text: These are those who are ready to make their escape from hell.
Name: Book 10

text: Although we of like-mind do not constitute a church, some have asked about what we are called in a philosophical sense.
Name: Book 10

text: I say to them that we are ascensionists.
Name: Book 10

text: Please do not confuse us with the mass ascensionists of either the New Age Movement, or the many Christian sects preaching the great rapture.
Name: Book 10

text: We are Internal Ascensionists It will probably be said of me that I am a dangerous man; that if everyone believed as I did, the foundations upon which this entire world rests would crumble.
Name: Book 10

text: But what could be meant by that.
Name: Book 10

text: Is it that the gates of hell would be opened and everyone could escape.
Name: Book 10

text: The only danger I bring is to those who stand to lose their power over others, as well as the money they fleece their sheep for.
Name: Book 10

text: Before we go into the first chapter, I would like for the reader to carefully consider what I have to say next.
Name: Book 10

text: Read the thirteenth chapter of Romans.
Name: Book 10

text: What I have to say is stated very profoundly in the Gideons Bible, and also in the New World Translation.
Name: Book 10

text: The King James version is a little more conservative, but it tells the same story.
Name: Book 10

text: Basically, the message is this: There is no authority but Gods authority.
Name: Book 10

text: and that is why we pay taxes to give tribute to Gods servants.
Name: Book 10

text: The Bible tells us that government agents are the servants of God, so lets consider just who they are.
Name: Book 10

text: In America, we know them all to be liars, cheats, thieves, and murderers.
Name: Book 10

text: Anyone who disagrees with this assessment has spent his or her entire life in front of a television set watching cartoons.
Name: Book 10

text: If our government agents and politicians are servants of the Biblical God, then he must be the God of this world, who is Lucifer.
Name: Book 10

text: Beyond the concept of escaping hell, this book will provide the reader with a wealth of esoteric knowledge in brief form.
Name: Book 10

text: Those of you who are able to grasp the concepts and their application to life in this world may feel a desire to share it all with friends and loved ones.
Name: Book 10

text: For this reason, I feel that I should allude to the universal law of attraction.
Name: Book 10

text: Most people are distracted and led by sources of entertainment.
Name: Book 10

text: Being lazy-minded, they prefer to sit passively and have their heads filled from the television, or to be told what to believe by religious authority.
Name: Book 10

text: Such as these will not be attracted to the notion of transcendence because of the personal responsibility involved - it becomes a task too monumental for them even to begin.
Name: Book 10

text: Therefore, dont be disappointed if you have difficulty in tearing someone away from his or her routine long enough to download and read the book.
Name: Book 10

text: They are simply being pulled elsewhere by the universal law of attraction.
Name: Book 10

text: Jon Stauffer CHAPTER 1 FOLLOWING IN THE FOOTSTEPS OF JESUS Most people will not entertain the thought that they can be spiritual without attending church.
Name: Book 10

text: They have been taught by parents, society and religious authority that church is where God requires us to learn spiritual principles, to show our devotion, to receive sacrament, or otherwise to worship him.
Name: Book 10

text: To them, the church is the Kingdom of God on Earth.
Name: Book 10

text: Someone who does not attend church is viewed as lacking in faith, possessing spiritual weakness, and therefore existing outside Gods kingdom.
Name: Book 10

text: For this reason, those who believe in Christ, Jehovah, or Allah do not recognize the validity of a spiritual path that stands aside from their understanding of religion.
Name: Book 10

text: All who know me know that I have studied the worlds religious and spiritual traditions aside from having been raised a Mormon and serving a full time mission for the LDS Church.
Name: Book 10

text: It cannot be said, therefore, that I lack knowledge of either scripture or religious practice.
Name: Book 10

text: Even so, the fact that I claim to walk a spiritual path which comes from within, has not been given much consideration by those who think I should attend church and go to the Temple.
Name: Book 10

text: In order for the nature of my path to be most easily understood by Christian readers, allow me to explain it in Christian terms.
Name: Book 10

text: To begin with, Christ said: The Kingdom of God is within.
Name: Book 10

text: In other words, Christ was telling his students to look within themselves rather than outside for the Kingdom of God.
Name: Book 10

text: Christians at this point, are thinking that even so, Christ established a church.
Name: Book 10

text: We make a mistake however, if we assume the church or churches actually, to have been an organized structure as we see in organized religion today.
Name: Book 10

text: A church literally refers to a group of people who come together.
Name: Book 10

text: People came together as Christ traveled around teaching groups in such places as Corinth and elsewhere.
Name: Book 10

text: The only organized religion with established dogmas and associated laws at that time was Judaism which was established by the priest class of Pharisees known as the Levites.
Name: Book 10

text: Islam and Christianity emerged later as offshoots of Judaism.
Name: Book 10

text: To know what Christ was teaching about the Kingdom of God being within, we have to understand that he was an Essene.
Name: Book 10

text: Although the Bible tells us this, few people consider the importance of the fact.
Name: Book 10

text: Some people even say: No, he was a Nazarene.
Name: Book 10

text: This is a reference to one who is from Nazareth.
Name: Book 10

text: The Essenes were an esoteric group that taught spiritual principles not given to the masses.
Name: Book 10

text: All esoteric groups in every culture around the world turn their students inward to find the Kingdom of God through a practice and discipline of meditation.
Name: Book 10

text: None of them ever established a hierarchical structure with a book of laws teaching that spiritual development and salvation depended on both, obedience to those laws, and the forgiveness of transgressions by someone outside our selves.
Name: Book 10

text: The Gnostics of Christs time referred to the process of turning within as Gnosis, meaning knowledge, or the way of knowledge.
Name: Book 10

text: The Vitkar of Northern Europe referred to the God within as the Hamingja, while the Hindus refer to it as the Atman, and the Essenes referred to it as the Father.
Name: Book 10

text: Christ, then, had not only found, but had become one with the God within, which some people refer to as the Higher Self.
Name: Book 10

text: Is God truly within.
Name: Book 10

text: Are not our bodies the Temples of God.
Name: Book 10

text: When we meditate, we should not blank the mind.
Name: Book 10

text: True meditation allows us to perceive a beautiful place of peace, or the Inner Sanctuary, wherein dwells the God within us.
Name: Book 10

text: This is what Christ was referring to.
Name: Book 10

text: This is where we receive guidance; and through this guidance, we receive knowledge and wisdom to accompany our spiritual development.
Name: Book 10

text: This is the path of enlightenment; the path that Christ placed before his disciples.
Name: Book 10

text: Many will contend that they do turn within, and that they receive inspiration on all sorts of issues.
Name: Book 10

text: Unfortunately, their idea of turning within involves kneeling in prayer before a God and/or Jesus residing outside them selves, and praying for guidance to be given them from outside.
Name: Book 10

text: Some of them are able to receive a certain amount of inspiration from the Higher Self on occasion, which confirms in their minds, the erroneous notion that their church is the one sanctioned by God.
Name: Book 10

text: They dont realize that they are employing in their own fashion, a universal law which can achieve results.
Name: Book 10

text: In accordance with spiritual law, however, the inspiration received must be limited by the individuals level of spiritual knowledge, and therefore, will remain within the parameters established by the one seeking such inspiration according to his or her religious beliefs.
Name: Book 10

text: This is not at all like turning within to find the Father.
Name: Book 10

text: Neither is this becoming spiritually liberated through inner guidance which provides knowledge and wisdom beyond that which is doled out by men with ambition for power and authority.
Name: Book 10

text: When we approach God within ourselves, we must do so pure in heart, and pure in spirit.
Name: Book 10

text: This means that we must leave behind, all that we have been taught by the Priests, the Ministers, Pastors and Bishops, and be ready to listen and to learn.
Name: Book 10

text: Our inner guidance will take us down a path regardless of our preconceived notions of the truth.
Name: Book 10

text: It evolves into an inner dialogue with the Higher Self, or God within, rather than some vague feeling we call the Holy Spirit bearing witness to our hearts.
Name: Book 10

text: The emotion we call a testimony is not the same as receiving inner guidance from the God within for every aspect of our lives.
Name: Book 10

text: In reference to turning within to find the Kingdom of God, Christ told his disciples that they would do even greater things than what they had seen him do.
Name: Book 10

text: Would this be possible if they listened to religious authorities who cautioned them against turning within as Christ taught, out of fear that they might be led astray by the devil.
Name: Book 10

text: Of course not; whats the Temple of God anyway, the Kingdom of God, or the Kingdom of the Devil.
Name: Book 10

text: We should be careful of following shepherds, because they herd sheep for only two reasons: 1.
Name: Book 10

text: For fleecing, and 2.
Name: Book 10

text: For ultimate butchering THINK ABOUT IT.
Name: Book 10

text: CHAPTER: 2 REMAINING FAITHFUL WHILE RECEIVING INNER GUIDANCE Whether we are Mormon, Catholic, Protestant, or even Muslim, it is not expected that we should have to give up being faithful members of our respective religions while turning within to receive inner guidance.
Name: Book 10

text: You can receive advice from your religious leaders, and then turn within for guidance in applying that advice.
Name: Book 10

text: You may also use your inner guidance to determine whether or not the advice is proper for you.
Name: Book 10

text: As long as you belong to a particular religion, your inner guidance will assist you in living your religion most effectively.
Name: Book 10

text: The logical question then, is: If my inner guidance assists me in my religion, and someone elses assists him in his, then how can we tell which religion is right.
Name: Book 10

text: How can God be contradictory.
Name: Book 10

text: The issue is not about whos religion is correct.
Name: Book 10

text: There are no absolutes in this universe, and that applies to truth as well.
Name: Book 10

text: We all like to believe that there can only be one true church, and that ours is it, but such a belief involves a belief system with absolutes.
Name: Book 10

text: Our universe is based on the Law of Paradox, which states: There is no greater truth than a lie, when any individual or group either needs or otherwise demands the lie at any given time.
Name: Book 10

text: In other words, we receive truth in increments as we become ready to receive it.
Name: Book 10

text: If our religion is what we need at this time, then our inner guidance will keep us there, and even assist us in being faithful and loyal members.
Name: Book 10

text: We shouldnt make the mistake, however, of assuming our truth to be universal and absolute.
Name: Book 10

text: It may not be right for everyone.
Name: Book 10

text: If your religious leaders are cautioning you against turning within, however, be advised that they are leading you away from what Christ taught.
Name: Book 10

text: There is nothing about remaining faithful to your religion that suggests you should become a mindless dupe.
Name: Book 10

text: In fact, you can use your inner guidance to learn how to deal with leaders who contradict that which you know to be true, and to deal with them in the most harmonious way possible.
Name: Book 10

text: When religious leaders caution you against turning within, most are fearful of losing you as a supporter.
Name: Book 10

text: The concern of some, however, may be legitimate.
Name: Book 10

text: There are circumstances which lend themselves to astral influences that could lead you astray.
Name: Book 10

text: As we continue, however, I will explain those circumstances, and exactly what we can do to assure a pure and clean inner communication process, free of all outside influences.
Name: Book 10

text: As we begin to turn within, the act of prayer becomes exposed as the act of turning outward that it is.
Name: Book 10

text: Beseeching a God outside ourselves for favors begins to take on a whole new reality.
Name: Book 10

text: As this occurs, it is not necessary for us to cause anxiety for others who are not capable of understanding our perspective; we can simply go through the motions as they do, while keeping focused on the Higher Self, or Father within.
Name: Book 10

text: In fact, this can become a good practice for establishing the fact in our minds that the Kingdom of God is indeed, within us.
Name: Book 10

text: We should be able to remain faithful to our respective religions, while at the same time remaining faithful to the one our religions claim to be following.
Name: Book 10

text: If our religious leaders force us to make a choice, however, then we have a serious decision to make.
Name: Book 10

text: Whether we choose to believe in the reality of reincarnation, or whether we choose to believe in our ability to tap into the collective unconscious for information, there is a wellspring of knowledge which can be accessed only by turning within.
Name: Book 10

text: In actuality, knowledge is available to us from both sources.
Name: Book 10

text: Beyond either the Mental and Causal Bodies where our past life knowledge is stored, and the collective unconscious, the Higher Self is capable of supplying knowledge and wisdom derived from the true spiritual realms to which he or she is indigenous.
Name: Book 10

text: Sometimes the Higher Self retrieves information from the Mental and Causal Bodies for us, and sometimes from the collective unconscious.
Name: Book 10

text: On rare occasions, information may be retrieved for us from the spiritual realms if the Higher Self has a link to he Silent Ones, to Odin or Omin, or to the All Itself.
Name: Book 10

text: Some of the foregoing terms with which you may not be familiar, will be explained as we proceed through the book.
Name: Book 10

text: Any way we look at it, truth must be derived from turning deep within ourselves.
Name: Book 10

text: To assume that others have already done so for us, and that we, therefore, have no need to do it in our own behalf, is to suggest that Christ was being frivolous when he told us that the Kingdom of God is within.
Name: Book 10

text: It makes no sense at all to be paying ten percent of our gross income, or otherwise donating huge sums of money to others who claim to be doing for us, that which we should be doing for ourselves.
Name: Book 10

text: CHAPTER: 3 HELL Some of you may not be ready for some of the truths expressed in this chapter, but all you have to do is turn within to the Higher Self, and let him or her sort through the material and guide you as regards that which you are to embrace at this time.
Name: Book 10

text: As you evolve, your understanding of truth will also evolve.
Name: Book 10

text: We have not yet come to the chapter where I explain how to communicate with your Higher Self, and if you have not already taken a workshop, then turning within will not be as productive as it could be.
Name: Book 10

text: For some itll be no problem in any case, but those for whom it is, I recommend that you accept that which is easy for you to accept, and hold the rest in reserve to decide on at a later time.
Name: Book 10

text: Now, lets discuss hell.
Name: Book 10

text: Since man first organized social and religious structures, creating and maintaining public fear of a place called hell has been big business.
Name: Book 10

text: Certainly, money and power constitute motivating factors for keeping people fearful in this way, but Id like to examine an even more sinister motivation for keeping people focused on a place so terrible that the thought of going there makes them pray for salvation.
Name: Book 10

text: Imagine that you were the master of an entire world of people so naive and superstitious, that your advanced technologies had them worshiping you.
Name: Book 10

text: Of course any personality flaws you had would certainly manifest in that world, since your devotees would endeavor to be like you.
Name: Book 10

text: Jealousy for instance, stemming from narcissism, coupled with bipolarism would make for a quite terrible world to live in.
Name: Book 10

text: To keep people worshiping you, they would have to believe that by doing so, they would receive a great reward in a place called heaven at the end of their suffering here.
Name: Book 10

text: Now consider the implications of their coming to understand your technologies.
Name: Book 10

text: Without fear of you, they would no longer worship you, and they would undoubtedly cut the apron string, and youd no longer be in control.
Name: Book 10

text: As bad as their existence had been under your rule, the promise of great rewards to come in exchange for their patience now, would go a long way in securing their loyalty, but it gets even better if you can create fear in their minds of a place of punishment for those who refuse to worship you.
Name: Book 10

text: The idea is to make them pray to you for their salvation.
Name: Book 10

text: Consider the foregoing in light of what we are taught in our religious institutions, and then consider the nature of the world in which we live.
Name: Book 10

text: We have rules to obey that we must pretend to like, or at least convince ourselves that we like while envying those who enjoy their Sundays.
Name: Book 10

text: Life is a struggle for survival while our emotional passions keep us on a rollercoaster ride, and religious leaders promise a better life after death if we give our time and money, while they threaten us with eternal sorrow if we dont.
Name: Book 10

text: Most of us tend to dismiss the principle of reincarnation offhandedly, because we fear that to give it any serious consideration whatsoever, would be the same as losing our faithfulness in the religious beliefs we have been taught from birth.
Name: Book 10

text: You know, of course, that Im going to tell you that this is part of a series of traps designed to keep us from figuring out the illusion and escaping hell.
Name: Book 10

text: Its a very effective one too, because if we fail to come to terms with the reality of reincarnation, we will never stop the cycles of karma.
Name: Book 10

text: Karma is the result of not only our deeds, but also our reactions to environmental stimuli both in the past of this life, and in past lifetimes.
Name: Book 10

text: In other words, we reap what we sow.
Name: Book 10

text: We dont need a vengeful god to make this a reality for us, because it is a major facet of natural law.
Name: Book 10

text: Often times, our process of transcending karma and this worldly existence depends on our understanding of why we are experiencing certain things in life.
Name: Book 10

text: To say that its Gods will, or that God is testing us, is not sufficient.
Name: Book 10

text: It fails to provide us with the required understanding.
Name: Book 10

text: For example, I lived most of my life unable to have a massage, because I couldnt have anyone touching my back from behind.
Name: Book 10

text: When I learned of a past life in which I was stabbed in the back and killed, however, I understood.
Name: Book 10

text: The associated energies were purified, and I can now receive massages.
Name: Book 10

text: Had I not undergone that experience, the natural cycles of karma would have necessitated, eventually, either my killing the one who had killed me, or having to be killed in the same way, over again.
Name: Book 10

text: Now, that cyclic pattern of karma has been stopped dead in its tracks.
Name: Book 10

text: Prior to 558 A.
Name: Book 10

text: , every culture and spiritual tradition in the world understood the principle of reincarnation, and this includes the early Christians.
Name: Book 10

text: There are Biblical references indicating the reality of reincarnation, but it was essentially written out of the equation when the records were compiled by the Catholic Church.
Name: Book 10

text: Because the people believed in reincarnation, the Nicaea Council stopped them from teaching or discussing it.
Name: Book 10

text: Then in 558 A.
Name: Book 10

text: , the Second Council of Constantinople declared the belief to be heresy.
Name: Book 10

text: After all, how can people be threatened with a fiery, burning hell for eternity if they know that they will be born again in the future.
Name: Book 10

text: How can they be enticed into accepting punishment now, with the promise of a better life in the hereafter, if they are to return to this world anyway.
Name: Book 10

text: Not every religion threatens its members with a fiery, burning hell, but those that dont, play on the emotional nature of their members, threatening them with eternal alienation from their family members, and an eternity without sex.
Name: Book 10

text: Although no scriptural reference exists anywhere, denouncing the concept of reincarnation, the people are kept obedient with the promise of a better life after this one, if they but remain faithful.
Name: Book 10

text: In analyzing the nature of this world, we find its very foundation to be rooted in violence.
Name: Book 10

text: Many of us are idealistically naive, feeling that nature is peaceful.
Name: Book 10

text: However, birds that we think are singing to us are either claiming their territory, warning others of imminent danger, or trying to mate.
Name: Book 10

text: Single cell organisms devour one another, and insects either suck the blood of animals and humans, or devour one another also.
Name: Book 10

text: In addition, they serve as food for larger species.
Name: Book 10

text: Mosquitoes, for instance, serve as food for fish, frogs, dragon flies and bats, and with such short life spans, why would a loving God give them the capacity to torture us by sucking our blood, and transmitting disease.
Name: Book 10

text: The so-called harmony of nature demands that for one living being to live, another must perish.
Name: Book 10

text: This even applies to vegans who must consume the lives of plants that possess consciousness, and experience trauma upon being killed.
Name: Book 10

text: Nature is extremely violent, with the carnivores constantly hunting their prey, and the herbivores constantly on watch, or running for their lives.
Name: Book 10

text: Look at the condition of this world on a global scale, with world powers throwing the innocent out like rag dolls to be tortured, maimed and killed for profit.
Name: Book 10

text: More of this has been done in the name of God, than for any other reason, and all warring factions claim that God is on their side.
Name: Book 10

text: He sanctions what everyone does to each other.
Name: Book 10

text: Even the Old Testament has God telling the Jews to slaughter all Non-Jews without mercy, and not even to leave a dog alive.
Name: Book 10

text: The Feast of Purim is a celebration of the slaughter of about 35,000 innocent Gentiles.
Name: Book 10

text: We can enjoy peace and happiness only in small increments, but we must struggle and plan for these, and they last only until another calamity arrives.
Name: Book 10

text: In the meantime, we satisfy ourselves with a few friendships, some nice beaches, pretty flowers, and some great sunsets, compliments of chemical trails and radioactive fallout.
Name: Book 10

text: Even rich people arent happy.
Name: Book 10

text: They have enjoyment, but they arent happy, overall; yet the rest of us spend our lives in pursuit of money, thinking that when we finally have enough, well be happy.
Name: Book 10

text: In the meantime, we find that in business, no one really likes us; they only want our money.
Name: Book 10

text: Government wants licensing fees, fees to operate machinery, fees for regulatory agencies, insurance fees, workmans compensation fees, social security fees, and taxes.
Name: Book 10

text: The FDA wants under-the-table fees to have certain products approved for distribution to the public, parasites called brokers must receive their share for doing little or nothing, and banks require fees for allowing us to do business with them, whether it be through checking accounts or credit card accounts; and it matters not, whether you are using a credit card, or simply honoring a banks card used by a customer - you pay a fee for the privilege of doing business.
Name: Book 10

text: Even your employees will cheat you out of hours worked if they can, and one business is constantly trying to devour another, while attorneys operate like sharks behind the scene.
Name: Book 10

text: We are no better off than the animals in nature.
Name: Book 10

text: Even those selling us on a better life after death want our money, some requiring 10% of our gross income.
Name: Book 10

text: Could any sane person place responsibility for this mess on a benevolent and loving Heavenly Father.
Name: Book 10

text: Hes just testing us.
Name: Book 10

text: Were so used to this mess, and in such a state of denial, that our minds are cauterized.
Name: Book 10

text: If we arent too miserable at any given time, we think were happy.
Name: Book 10

text: Of course, there is a certain bliss associated with ignorance.
Name: Book 10

text: If someone excites our lower emotional passions, were either happy or angry.
Name: Book 10

text: While we await a better life in heaven, we either drown ourselves in T.
Name: Book 10

text: , movies, video games, computers, drugs and alcohol, or we scramble furiously for other distractions such as vacations, restaurants and shopping; anything to avoid reality.
Name: Book 10

text: Lets face it; we live in a hell world with some pretty flowers.
Name: Book 10

text: Many people try to vindicate the God of this world by saying that he gave us our free agency.
Name: Book 10

text: In a way he did, but if we dont do what he says, and in the way he says to do it, while pretending to like it, we get punished without mercy.
Name: Book 10

text: In the old days punishment was swift, so as bad as things are, Id say that they are going pretty much the way he wants them.
Name: Book 10

text: Please dont misunderstand me.
Name: Book 10

text: I actually enjoy life, and I laugh every day.
Name: Book 10

text: Even if were in hell, we have to have fun, and its possible to find enjoyment - even periods of bliss while were here.
Name: Book 10

text: Its no different than it is for convicts in prison.
Name: Book 10

text: Do you think they spend all their years suffering.
Name: Book 10

text: They create their own society with rules, recreation, and both physical and spiritual development.
Name: Book 10

text: They tell jokes, establish friendships, and do a lot of laughing.
Name: Book 10

text: Its in our nature as human beings, to make the best of our circumstances.
Name: Book 10

text: If a person was born in prison, his life would be so natural that there would be no basis upon which to believe that there was anything at all wrong.
Name: Book 10

text: The child wouldnt like his circumstances, but he would feel happy most of the time.
Name: Book 10

text: Whether or not a prisoner experiences relative happiness, he or she is still in prison, and the same applies to all of us regarding the hell world we live in.
Name: Book 10

text: Mormons are taught, and many other Christians have been astute enough to realize that Lucifer is the god of this world.
Name: Book 10

text: How many have actually contemplated the significance of this fact, however.
Name: Book 10

text: Are we to satisfy ourselves with the statement that Lucifer has the power to bruise mans heels.
Name: Book 10

text: Are we childish enough to believe that someone with God status is so impotent that all he can do is follow us around kicking at the backs of our heels.
Name: Book 10

text: Many people view Lucifer as a fallen angel, but in the Book of Enoch, we are told that those who follow Satan were here before the fallen angels.
Name: Book 10

text: This is a Book not shared with the Gentiles/Goyim, by the way.
Name: Book 10

text: In any case, Lucifer being the god of this world was here before the fallen angels, who were actually fallen from his grace - but thats another story for another time.
Name: Book 10

text: Lucifer is only a nickname, or title actually, for Dominion, and Catholics still say an ancient prayer to him from the early days, using the Latin form of Dominus.
Name: Book 10

text: Why should it be so difficult to understand that the god of this world could, and would establish a trap to keep us confined within his kingdom.
Name: Book 10

text: Why should it be so difficult to understand that organized religion is a part of that trap, when it directs us outward to books, laws, prophets, and priests, telling us that by turning inward, we run the risk of being led astray by the devil, while only pretending to lead us in the footsteps of the Saints, Sages, and so-called Saviors.
Name: Book 10

text: Those who have made millions of dollars, and who stand to make millions more, prance about on stage, stand behind pulpits and write books threatening congregations of fearful souls with the wrath of a vengeful god.
Name: Book 10

text: They keep the money pouring in by convincing people that only their repentance, their fear, and their generous donations will save them from an eternity in hell.
Name: Book 10

text: Some religious leaders are solemn and serious, as they subtly threaten their huge flocks with the separation from their parents, spouses and children if they fail to keep the faith.
Name: Book 10

text: They tell them that only those who dedicate and sacrifice their whole lives, all their loyalty, and ten percent of their gross incomes will be able to have sex in the life after this one.
Name: Book 10

text: Eternal alienation and celibacy is the hell they fear.
Name: Book 10

text: In one way or another, everyone is taught to fear god.
Name: Book 10

text: God is the jealous and vengeful parent commanding all the inhabitants of Earth to humble them selves before him, to erect costly edifices to him from which his Word must be preached, and to sacrifice their time and money to his servants.
Name: Book 10

text: We are taught that he is our loving and benevolent Heavenly Father on the one hand, while on the other, we are taught that failure to appease him will result in eternal punishment and damnation.
Name: Book 10

text: Everyone lives in such fear of hell, that they are afraid to ask themselves the most appropriate question under the circumstances: Are we already in hell.
Name: Book 10

text: When we consider the fact that organized religion keeps us praying to the god of this world, both in hopes of a better life after death, and in order to avoid a punishment worse than this life provides, it becomes clear that religion is a tool designed to keep us from escaping hell.
Name: Book 10

text: The Tibetan Book of the Dead offers a set of instructions to be read to the deceased as they enter the after-death state.
Name: Book 10

text: Accounts of those who have passed over and then returned, show a wide variety of experiences because the deceased tends to experience that which he or she expects to experience - that which exists in the unconscious.
Name: Book 10

text: Most religionists have no clear concept of a heaven, but they do have a very clear and vivid concept of hell.
Name: Book 10

text: This is most unfortunate for some, because they will tend to experience that which they fear the most.
Name: Book 10

text: The lucky ones are those who dont dwell on hell, and instead focus on an after-life existence of peace and tranquility.
Name: Book 10

text: The ancients of Northern Europe had established a cultural and spiritual tradition with resulting archetypes that took on an actual existence on the astral plane, where those of that lineage could go in the after-death state to be with their own people.
Name: Book 10

text: This was the case with all cultures, and this is precisely why organized religion has endeavored to eradicate all the cultural traditions of a spiritual nature, and to integrate all races and their cultures.
Name: Book 10

text: When a culture loses its heritage, its archetypes die on the astral plane.
Name: Book 10

text: Then the people themselves lose interest in their own traditions, culture and spirituality, eventually miscegenating themselves out of existence.
Name: Book 10

text: Without a place of their own, many people drift like in a dream through the worlds of their own unconscious until someone awakens them.
Name: Book 10

text: The Tibetans refer to this state as the Bardo, and the instructions contained in the Tibetan Book of the Dead were designed to alert the deceased to his or her situation in hopes that he or she might become self-determining on the other side.
Name: Book 10

text: Throughout the ages, Saints and Sages of both Hinduism and Buddhism, along with the Eck Masters of both ancient Tibet and modern times have taught that this world is Maya, or Illusion.
Name: Book 10

text: The initial response of most people to a statement such as this is almost always that you cannot get any more real than this.
Name: Book 10

text: Then they make an animated reference to one or more of the five senses.
Name: Book 10

text: We can feel that the body and other objects are real, we can see the reality of this world, and we trust in that which we hear.
Name: Book 10

text: To many people, the notion of a sixth or psychic sense borders on illusion because it cannot be verified by one of the five senses.
Name: Book 10

text: The fact that it is often verified by experience is subject to debate because it can be dismissed as mere coincidence.
Name: Book 10

text: The fact is, that the physical elements associated with this world are viewed as real, while that which is outside the experience of the physical organism is viewed as illusion.
Name: Book 10

text: So what, then, do we mean by the illusion of this world.
Name: Book 10

text: Quantum physicists deal with particles smaller than atoms on a regular basis.
Name: Book 10

text: Can we detect them with our five senses.
Name: Book 10

text: No, but we accept their existence nevertheless.
Name: Book 10

text: Does the fact that one particle can affect another many miles away without going anywhere fit into our realm of personal experience.
Name: Book 10

text: No, but its still a fact.
Name: Book 10

text: The illusion of this world is multifaceted, and consists largely of light refractions that block our perceptions of nearly everything but the five senses.
Name: Book 10

text: An electromagnetic time loop creates the illusion that time is linear, so we satisfy ourselves with the notion that what we experience in life is all there is to it.
Name: Book 10

text: Quantum physics and the electromagnetic time loop are some of the aspects of the illusion to which I refer, and our five senses actually play a role in maintaining the illusion.
Name: Book 10

text: A major aspect of an Adepts enlightenment involves full recognition of the illusion in which he or she has been trapped.
Name: Book 10

text: In this world, we have what many have come to view as a collective unconscious.
Name: Book 10

text: It exists within the parameters of what I refer to as a Transduction Matrix, but which is more commonly known as the Akasha.
Name: Book 10

text: The collective unconscious is our Bardo, and its Dominions playground.
Name: Book 10

text: When a Sage who becomes enlightened states that this world is Maya, and that only the unenlightened struggle, or that we should do nothing, strive at nothing, or that we should fight against nothing, he is correct.
Name: Book 10

text: The Sage has learned that this world is a trap, and that there is no higher path than coming to understand its illusory nature in order to transcend it.
Name: Book 10

text: The Sage views all of mankinds struggles as a series of distractions designed to keep us within the trap.
Name: Book 10

text: It would be the same for the deceased in his own Bardo, believing it to be real.
Name: Book 10

text: It makes sense that organized religion would attempt to stamp out all pagan belief systems as it did, in order to keep the masses from escaping the trap.
Name: Book 10

text: We are in Lucifers hell right now, and a lot of effort has gone into making us believe in some other hell that is worse, while preventing us from discovering the illusion by turning inward.
Name: Book 10

text: The god of this world would indeed, be very displeased if we discovered the secret of escaping hell.
Name: Book 10

text: From Dominion/Lucifer as the god of this world, through his hierarchy of angels, and through the occult leaders of the world and all their religious and financial institutions, the great illusion is kept alive as people are kept distracted from the reality within.
Name: Book 10

text: As I have stated over and over, this is Dominions world, and he is the master of illusion.
Name: Book 10

text: This is our collective Bardo, and our highest aspiration should be to climb out of it.
Name: Book 10

text: Be assured that unless measures are taken to free ourselves from the illusion and its trap, we will recycle to this hell once again.
Name: Book 10

text: For many this is just fine, because their lower emotional passions keep them enmeshed in this place like pigs routing in their mud and dung.
Name: Book 10

text: For those of us who see a vision of what lies beyond the pig pen of life, there comes a yearning to climb out and move onward.

frame.Frame: Cause  change  of  position  on  a  scale

Name: Book 10

text: A problem arises, however, when others try to distract us, saying things like: Hey, where do you think youre going.
Name: Book 10

text: Theres nothing out there for you.
Name: Book 10

text: Get back here where you belong.
Name: Book 10

text: If we cant follow the admonition of countless Sages throughout history by turning inward, then we may as well remain someones sheep.
Name: Book 10

text: CHAPTER 4 WHAT HAPPENED TO GOD.
Name: Book 10

text: At this point many readers are probably wondering whether or not I am an atheist; and if not, then what happened to God.
Name: Book 10

text: If its true that we are in hell, then what happened to make God either send us here, or abandon us to Lucifer.
Name: Book 10

text: What have we done wrong, and who is God in any case.
Name: Book 10

text: For those who are able to accept spiritual responsibility beyond the customary dependence of children upon a parental figure, more truth is available.
Name: Book 10

text: We must be willing however, to transcend our previous notions of a God who establishes all our circumstances for us based on his pleasure or displeasure at the time.
Name: Book 10

text: We are in hell not because of punishment incurred for displeasing God, but because we have failed to recognize the so-called god that set our trap, and we have failed to remove the shackles with which he has held us captive.
Name: Book 10

text: We have failed to recognize the Biblical God for who he is, and consequently, we have been removed from the influence of the God we once recognized long, long ago.
Name: Book 10

text: The term God is derived from the parent language of all the Germanic languages (of which English is one), called Old Norse.
Name: Book 10

text: It is Godh in its transliteration form, and it literally means Good.
Name: Book 10

text: Only the god of this world who we know to be Dominion has ever desired to carry a title denoting him as good.
Name: Book 10

text: The original source of all creation is known by living beings throughout the universe as either The Source, or as The One.
Name: Book 10

text: Our Northern European ancestors used a name which translates to The All, because the source of all creation has manifested as everything.
Name: Book 10

text: This issue will be elaborated on more fully, in the chapter entitled Creation.
Name: Book 10

text: In order to understand reality beyond the parameters of this little prison we call Earth, we need to discuss who we are, where we came from, and where we would be if we hadnt been trapped here long ago.
Name: Book 10

text: Only in this way, can we come to realize how little our understanding has been.
Name: Book 10

text: The notion that we were with God in Heaven and there was a war in Heaven as well is merely a mythological concept, although it does have a foundation of truth supporting it.
Name: Book 10

text: The myth reveals the status we have been given as children, and we are even told that unless we become as little children, we cannot enter into the Kingdom of Heaven (of course, according to Christ thats supposed to be within us).
Name: Book 10

text: Are we to be given worlds to govern as Gods and Goddesses.
Name: Book 10

text: Some religious authorities claim that those who go to Heaven will indeed become such; but with the status of little children.
Name: Book 10

text: I dont think so.
Name: Book 10

text: Children are nave, ignorant, immature, and dependant upon adults for their existence; therefore, such a philosophy is designed to keep us from growing up spiritually and becoming responsible adults in our own spiritual right.
Name: Book 10

text: Thus we remain trapped by our own volition.
Name: Book 10

text: In all the other worlds throughout the universe, people live thirty to forty thousand years in one dimensional realm evolving, until their vibratory frequency comes to match the next highest dimension, at which time they ascend there.
Name: Book 10

text: For them, the principle of reincarnation applies to circumstances where an individual is killed.
Name: Book 10

text: He or she loses the body, but goes to the astral world associated with that dimensional realm until a new body becomes available.
Name: Book 10

text: They do not, however, continually recycle through a seemingly endless succession of births and deaths as we have been doing in this hell we call Gods creation.
Name: Book 10

text: Long ago, we existed in the fourth dimensional realm where the planet was known as Tara.
Name: Book 10

text: In the material worlds of dualism, there are twelve dimensions, each with its own astral world or counterpart.
Name: Book 10

text: Beyond the twelfth dimension (D-12), there is a Great Abyss, and beyond that are situated the spiritual planes of dimensions thirteen, fourteen, and fifteen, all with their own counterparts.
Name: Book 10

text: We are situated in D-3, or the third dimension.
Name: Book 10

text: On Tara, there was a Ruling House, the Spiritual Adepts and the General Military Staff.
Name: Book 10

text: Dominion wanted to ascend the entire planet of Tara through the dimensional realms quickly, where he could rival the All with his own kingdom.
Name: Book 10

text: In order to understand his plan, we must first understand a little bit about the nature of time.
Name: Book 10

text: In quantific terms, the entire universe is structured from Light and Sound Quanta.
Name: Book 10

text: Sound forms a matrix of sorts which moves as a current, and serves as the foundation of all manifested forms.
Name: Book 10

text: Consisting of just so many tonal frequencies, Sound is a loop.
Name: Book 10

text: Time has a place on the Sound Matrix, and therefore constitutes a loop as well.
Name: Book 10

text: The time loop begins at a particular tonal frequency called the fundamental, and progresses up through the multiple integrals to the natural minor, and then moves back through to the frequency fundamental once again.
Name: Book 10

text: This is a sound loop with an opposite directional flow of Light Quanta, and thus, the loop brings us back to the frequency fundamental at the same octave.
Name: Book 10

text: This provides a perceptual awareness of the moment of being, and establishes what seems to be eternal life.
Name: Book 10

text: The only exception to this would be an accidental death.
Name: Book 10

text: Dominions plan was to pull the opposite directional flow of Light Quanta into the time loop.
Name: Book 10

text: Sound is magnetic in nature, and light is electric.
Name: Book 10

text: This would, he reasoned, create an electromagnetic time loop that would increase the frequency fundamental by an octave with each successive loop, and allow him to rival the All within a very short period of time.
Name: Book 10

text: The Ruling House, Spiritual Adepts, and General Military Staff opposed Dominion in this endeavor, and thus became his targets when he decided to attack with tonal frequencies designed to eliminate those of us who were among those three groups.
Name: Book 10

text: We were not able to prevent the attack, but we were able to prevent total annihilation, as we were thrust into D-3.
Name: Book 10

text: The attack nearly destroyed the energy grids of Tara, but when all was finally secured, we were seeded with bodies here in this realm.
Name: Book 10

text: Dominion decided then, to create his electromagnetic time loop here, and did so, because Taras energy grids were still too unstable.
Name: Book 10

text: His plan failed, however, and rather than ascend Earth through the dimensional realms, the electromagnetic time loop established linear time for us here on earth.
Name: Book 10

text: Viewing an electromagnetic spectrum, we can see that the wave pattern moves in a linear fashion.
Name: Book 10

text: With the frequency fundamental of the time loop increasing its octave with each loop, time has been speeding up, and our life spans have become increasingly shorter, necessitating more frequent incarnations as we recycle over and over again.
Name: Book 10

text: This is the nature of Dominions trap, and this is what won him the title of Lucifer.
Name: Book 10

text: Lucifer literally means The bearer of light, or The light giver.
Name: Book 10

text: When he pulled the light into the sound loop, he said: Let there be light.
Name: Book 10

text: Yes, Lucifer is not only the god of this world, but he is the Biblical god as well.
Name: Book 10

text: Most mythologies have a foundation of truth supporting their existence.
Name: Book 10

text: The foregoing is the foundation of truth supporting the mythological concept of a war in heaven.
Name: Book 10

text: God did not thrust Lucifer into hell; rather Lucifer thrust us into hell, and then assumed the title of God over us.
Name: Book 10

text: The All is not a humanoid entity with emotions, and who would control our existence, or even interfere in our life processes.
Name: Book 10

text: It has no gender, and it manifests no circumstances born of desire, as is the case with egoistic entities.
Name: Book 10

text: I realize that this description doesnt sound all fuzzy, warm and secure, but we shouldnt want to pay the penalty for someone willing to promise us that.
Name: Book 10

text: We have to grow up spiritually, sometime.
Name: Book 10

text: The All is conscious, and It thinks.
Name: Book 10

text: In fact, it constitutes everything in existence as a result of Its expansive thought.
Name: Book 10

text: This will become more clear in the chapter on Creation.
Name: Book 10

text: The bottom line is that we will remain within Lucifers trap as long as we wait for a Savior to rescue us.
Name: Book 10

text: It is imperative that we grow up spiritually, and take personal responsibility for our own existence.
Name: Book 10

text: We must free ourselves from this hell we call gods creation.
Name: Book 10

text: CHAPTER 5 ESCAPING HELL Didnt the Biblical god make a bet with a demon that ended up causing Job a whole lot of pain and misery.
Name: Book 10

text: This petty little game of one-up-man-ship not only proved that Job would continue to worship Dominion from a position on his knees regardless of his suffering, but it also marked the god of this world as a narcissist.
Name: Book 10

text: A psychologist by the name of Sandy Hotchkiss states that narcissists have unrealistic expectations of unconditional approval and admiration.
Name: Book 10

text: Didnt god get mad and destroy the earth once because the people wouldnt pay attention to him.
Name: Book 10

text: Does the commandment thou shalt have no other Gods before me take on a new significance now.
Name: Book 10

text: God says that hes a jealous god.
Name: Book 10

text: This should be our real clue, because jealousy is an extreme form of envy, which is one of the seven deadly sins of narcissism as accepted by psychologists everywhere.
Name: Book 10

text: The god of this world then, is a narcissist from hell.
Name: Book 10

text: So, lets break free from the bonds of this world.
Name: Book 10

text: The logical question is this: What bonds could there possibly be, that could bind us to this world.
Name: Book 10

text: The cycles of karma keep us bound, as does a time loop which escapes our notice because of our ignorance regarding the nature of the rest of the universe.
Name: Book 10

text: Our attachments to all the distractions that life offers also keep us bound, and so do all the illusions that keep us believing in the reality of this world as resented by religion.
Name: Book 10

text: We can transcend the cycles of karma through a process which purifies specific energies known to Hindus as samskaras, and to the ancient Northern Europeans as Wyrd.
Name: Book 10

text: Of course, the ego-self cannot  purify itself, so we must rely on the process of turning inward as Christ, along with all Saints and Sages both past and present have taught.
Name: Book 10

text: We must have an understanding of time loops as they exist naturally, so that we can compare our life experience to that standard in order to comprehend the nature of, and to release ourselves from the unnatural time loop which keeps us bound to this world.
Name: Book 10

text: The distractions of life keep us bound through our lower emotional passions which must be purified in the alchemical process, right along with the seeds of karma.

frame.Frame: Cause  change  of  position  on  a  scale

Name: Book 10

text: As long as we believe in the reality of this world as presented by religion, we will never see its illusory nature, and thus, we will never dispel the trap.
Name: Book 10

text: In planning our escape from hell, we must first examine that which has kept us trapped.
Name: Book 10

text: Since our situation is multifaceted, allow me to deal with it in increments.
Name: Book 10

text: We must first break through the illusion, so Ill begin there with those aspects of the illusion which are natural throughout the universe, and then well discuss those aspects that are artificial, and which apply specifically to this third dimensional realm.
Name: Book 10

text: Those aspects of our illusion which are common throughout the universe are as follows: 1.
Name: Book 10

text: The illusion of space between objects.
Name: Book 10

text: Just like the objects on a computer screen, there exists an electromagnetic field of potential manifestation of other objects, keeping all things connected.
Name: Book 10

text: No real space between the perceived objects actually exists.
Name: Book 10

text: This is the principle behind the phenomenon witnessed by quantum physicists, where one particle affects another many miles away, without ever moving anywhere.
Name: Book 10

text: One aspect of the illusion of linear time is maintained by travel from point - A to point - B in a given amount of time.
Name: Book 10

text: The illusion is dispelled when we learn to experience various locations through a shift in our attention through what some call remote viewing, which can be considered as a movement in space/time.
Name: Book 10

text: In this way, we discover that the past and future exist simultaneously in the here and now.
Name: Book 10

text: Another aspect is maintained by the cyclic pattern of days, months, seasons and years, combined with a continuum of perception and experience.
Name: Book 10

text: The illusion is dispelled when we experience the past by going there through perceptual awareness, which demonstrates the fact that all space and time are here now.
Name: Book 10

text: Another aspect is maintained by the perception of a starting point for all things, and a progressive process called transformation, or evolution.
Name: Book 10

text: This is a perception of movement through linear time to some perceived destination in the future, with ones original state perceived as being situated in the past.
Name: Book 10

text: The illusion is dispelled when we have the shamanic experience demonstrating the fact discovered by quantum physicists, regarding all space and time existing here and now.
Name: Book 10

text: Then we realize that we are already transformed, and need only to make it our reality.
Name: Book 10

text: Each stage of transformation occurs in the moment of being, and constitutes a transformed condition - it is not a process which extends through linear time.
Name: Book 10

text: Quantum forces propel us from one state of consciousness to another, all in the here and now.
Name: Book 10

text: The aspects of our illusion that are specific to our situation in Dominions trap are as follows: 1.
Name: Book 10

text: An unnaturally occurring ionosphere which envelopes not only our planet, but also our third dimensional realm.
Name: Book 10

text: The ionosphere consists of electrically charged ions which refract light in such a way as to diminish our perceptions of anything other than our illusory world of the five senses.

frame.Frame: Cause  change  of  position  on  a  scale

Name: Book 10

text: An electromagnetic time loop which continually increases through the octaves, forming a foundation for the belief in time as a movement from the past, through the present, and on to the future, through a rapid aging process.
Name: Book 10

text: This is an experience in linear time, where the moment of being exists as a philosophical perception, rather than a perceptual reality, though situated and occurring in the midst of evolutionary processes.
Name: Book 10

text: Psychic time loops applied individually by Dominions archangels, requiring that we recycle in an endless procession of births and deaths.
Name: Book 10

text: Each life experience is explained in an illusory fashion as being gods will.
Name: Book 10

text: The collective unconscious within which, we have been kept prisoner in the same way that some people drift through their own unconscious (the Bardo) in the after-death state.
Name: Book 10

text: This illusion of reality is kept alive by occult powers in social structures, religion and even through educational programming.
Name: Book 10

text: I briefly discussed the collective unconscious in the chapter entitled Hell, but to more fully understand it, allow me to relate it to todays reality.
Name: Book 10

text: The founding fathers of this nation established a system under the Articles of Confederation, but did they change the fact of British/Banker/Illuminati control.
Name: Book 10

text: All our judges and lawyers are licensed under the BAR, which stands for British Accredited Registry.
Name: Book 10

text: Corporate banks direct every aspect of this nation through their status as creditor over the debtor, and a coalition of Illuminati run the corporate banks.
Name: Book 10

text: In an effort to establish one race and one culture world wide, social engineering and propaganda have been employed which have been miscegenating the White race out of existence.
Name: Book 10

text: Has any racial awareness movement on our part even begun to turn the tide.
Name: Book 10

text: Spirit Warriors have battled Dominions forces on the planes for years, now.
Name: Book 10

text: Major changes have occurred in other realms, but has the machinery been stopped or even slowed down in our third dimensional realm.
Name: Book 10

text: The NRA, John Birch Society, National and State Militias, and even the New Republic have done nothing but spin the wheels of those who are attempting to wake up and smell the coffee.
Name: Book 10

text: Patriots everywhere draw the line of tyranny acceptance, only to continue drawing it as the machine marches over them.
Name: Book 10

text: It seems that nothing ever gets accomplished.
Name: Book 10

text: Its like being in a dream where running is impossible, no matter how hard one tries.
Name: Book 10

text: This is the Bardo of which I speak.
Name: Book 10

text: Just as some of the deceased may drift through his or her worlds of the unconscious in the after-death state, only conscious enough to exist in a dream while believing it to be real, so do we drift through the collective unconscious believing it to be real.
Name: Book 10

text: This is part of the illusion that Dominion as the god of this world, created for us.
Name: Book 10

text: We try to run, but just like a man under water, we cant.
Name: Book 10

text: We make great changes in our circumstances, but just like a man caught in the Twilight Zone, we find ourselves continuing our struggle over and over again.
Name: Book 10

text: This is Dominions world, and our Bardo.
Name: Book 10

text: Everyone plays a role in the overall scenario which constitutes Dominions ever-evolving soap opera.
Name: Book 10

text: As the god of this world, it is his stage, and his play.
Name: Book 10

text: We may be able to effectuate minor changes within certain parameters, but we can never change the scenario itself.
Name: Book 10

text: Certainly, it is our responsibility to fight the battle for balance in this world and elsewhere, but the question is whether or not weve been going about it correctly.
Name: Book 10

text: We have been correct regarding our immediate needs, and even to the point at which we understand our situation; but now that we fully understand the illusion, we can also understand the fact that functioning within the parameters of that illusion will gain us nothing besides wisdom, temporary reprieve, and honor among those who are caught up in the collective unconscious.
Name: Book 10

text: It will not, however, gain us success in our ultimate goals, nor will it free us from Dominions trap.
Name: Book 10

text: Joining religions, political parties, militia groups, or any other group or movement that is established by those drifting through the collective unconscious or Bardo, merely prevents our escape from hell.
Name: Book 10

text: The final aspect of our illusion involves the principle of karma.
Name: Book 10

text: Due to the fact that our electromagnetic time loop keeps us recycling so quickly, we are seldom able to make a connection between our life experiences and the responsibility that is ours as a result of previous behavior, previous desires based in the lower emotional passions, and emotional energies held within from previous actions taken against either ourselves, or our loved ones.

frame.Frame: Cause  change  of  position  on  a  scale

Name: Book 10

text: Our inability to make the connection keeps us believing that we are continually acted upon either by God, or by the Devil.
Name: Book 10

text: This is another reason for the early churchs banishment of the concept of reincarnation.
Name: Book 10

text: It goes hand in hand with the principle of karma, an understanding of which dispels the illusion of forces greater than ourselves either rewarding us for our obedience, punishing us for our disobedience, or testing us.
Name: Book 10

text: Judaism, Islam and Christianity share a common value system which is alien to all spiritual traditions, past and present.
Name: Book 10

text: This system involves: 1.
Name: Book 10

text: Obedience to one single deity.
Name: Book 10

text: Subservience to the deitys servants on Earth.
Name: Book 10

text: Conformity to the social morays established by the deitys servants.
Name: Book 10

text: Avoidance of punishment.
Name: Book 10

text: Surrender of ones own judgments and opinions to the deitys servants.
Name: Book 10

text: Acceptance of the deitys judgments.
Name: Book 10

text: Hope in a better life after death.
Name: Book 10

text: In this chapter, you have received the secret knowledge.
Name: Book 10

text: Understanding all aspects of the great illusion allows us to transcend the illusion itself, abut it helps if we can also understand how to apply the secret knowledge.
Name: Book 10

text: This is the subject matter of the following chapter.
Name: Book 10

text: CHAPTER: 6 HOW TO APPLY THE SECRET KNOWLEDGE In this chapter we will apply the knowledge we have gained.
Name: Book 10

text: The ionosphere, of which I spoke, is not a problem as long as we realize that it is there and refuse to be blinded by it.
Name: Book 10

text: By this I mean that we can begin to trust in the subtle impressions we receive from the Higher Self.
Name: Book 10

text: Those who have greater psychic abilities are less affected by the ionosphere, and tend naturally to accept their subtle impressions because they are more profound.
Name: Book 10

text: Our inner communication process however, can be of great value to all of us.
Name: Book 10

text: In the chapter entitled Following In the Footsteps of Jesus, we discussed turning within to the Higher Self, known variously as the Hamingja, the Atman, or the Father.
Name: Book 10

text: Mahanta is another related term from out of ancient Tibet.
Name: Book 10

text: We often receive promptings from the Higher Self as he or she attempts to get our attention, but Christians perceiving everything outside them selves, generally refer to these promptings as being from the Holy Spirit, which they dont realize was originally a reference to the Higher Self.
Name: Book 10

text: We can all receive these promptings as a matter of birthright, but to establish an inner dialogue requires that we employ a universal law.
Name: Book 10

text: Allow me to explain.
Name: Book 10

text: Our entrapment here in Dominions realm included the severing of the 7th, 8th, and 9th bass tones of our third DNA strands, which separated us in consciousness from what we now refer to as the Higher Self.
Name: Book 10

text: All other beings throughout the universe are what they call whole, and thus they enjoy their natural instincts.
Name: Book 10

text: We are universally called Shells due to our emptiness of spirit (Higher Self), and this is what Christ referred to when he turned his disciples inward.
Name: Book 10

text: Consequently, we possess only rudimentary instincts as acknowledged by scientists, and we are less intelligent than beings that live on other planets and in other dimensions.
Name: Book 10

text: Therefore, the Spiritual Law of Ego Sovereignty, which states that higher dimensional beings are not to interfere in the processes of those in the lower dimensional realms, dictates that we must first recognize the Higher Self (or the God within), then approach him or her (knock on the door) through the process of meditation.
Name: Book 10

text: For those who cant, or think they cant meditate, there is nothing to worry about.
Name: Book 10

text: We need only to close our eyes and relax the mind.
Name: Book 10

text: Focusing all the attention inward, simply make it known to the Higher Self that you wish to make contact and establish an inner dialogue; that you wish to both receive and live by his or her inner guidance.
Name: Book 10

text: Technically, the Higher Self, being indigenous to the true spiritual realms beyond the Great Abyss, possesses no gender.
Name: Book 10

text: However, we have all been incarnating within the material worlds of dualism for eons of time now, and each one of our Higher Selves have picked up certain traits which lend themselves to either one gender or the other.
Name: Book 10

text: If we are heterosexual, then chances are that our Higher Self is of the same gender that we are in this incarnation.
Name: Book 10

text: Once we have made this commitment, we need to realize that it is possible to relax the mind while focusing inward with a question, and to have that question answered.
Name: Book 10

text: For most of us, it is advantageous to receive confirmation of the answers we receive, through a physical response to questions designed to elicit either yes or no responses.
Name: Book 10

text: For example, I might receive a fluttering in my right eyelid for a yes response, and a fluttering in the left for a no response.
Name: Book 10

text: I might receive a rush of warm energy up my torso for a yes, or a cold rush of energy downward for a no.
Name: Book 10

text: Most people balance on their feet, and are pulled off balance forward for a yes response, or pushed backward for a no.
Name: Book 10

text: Personally, I receive a movement in my neck muscles, either pushing my head forward, or pulling it back.
Name: Book 10

text: Ultimately, we want to receive direct communications from the Higher Self, and use the yes/no response to verify our interpretations.
Name: Book 10

text: There are a few Adepts who are capable of establishing ones connection to the Higher Self, while releasing all potential interferences from the auric field, and establishing protection against outside forces which would attempt to mimic the Higher Self.
Name: Book 10

text: Some people, however, either feel that they have no need for such procedures, or that they are fully capable of establishing their own connections.
Name: Book 10

text: I wont be so presumptuous as to suggest they cant do this, but for those who feel that they would like assistance, that which is required will be forthcoming automatically, through the Mani-Om-Saw Institute, at mainomsah.
Name: Book 10

text: com.
Name: Book 10

text: For those who elect not to take advantage of either the discourses or the workshop, be aware that unless a person is undergoing spiritual purification, interference in the inner communication process is generally not an issue in any case.
Name: Book 10

text: Many people are of the erroneous notion that once we have learned all our lessons, we can stop incarnating here and move on.

frame.Frame: Cause  change  of  position  on  a  scale

Name: Book 10

text: Learning lessons is not what its all about.
Name: Book 10

text: First of all, we must undergo a spiritual purification process as I mentioned before, wherein certain energies retained in the subconscious, along with associated emotional passions are released in our transcendence of those karmic issues.
Name: Book 10

text: This allows our vibratory frequencies to increase beyond what would normally be the case.
Name: Book 10

text: Secondly, Dominions electromagnetic time loop interfaces with a psychic time loop placed on each of us, keeping us within its cyclic pattern.
Name: Book 10

text: Thus, our awareness and conscious will in the after-death state, may allow self determination between incarnations; but they will not prevent us from having to return to Dominions hell, eventually.
Name: Book 10

text: The psychic time loop is easily removed as one becomes attuned with the Higher Self through either the discourses or a workshop, but another karmic trap exists.
Name: Book 10

text: In the Hindu tradition, there are four kinds of karma discussed.
Name: Book 10

text: There is past karma, present karma, and future karma which are explained in accordance with the perspective of the guru giving discourse at the time.
Name: Book 10

text: The fourth kind of karma is not elaborated on at all, but simply mentioned as being allotted karma.
Name: Book 10

text: This is what Dominions archangels have placed on us during our stay in an astral center between incarnations.
Name: Book 10

text: This is why we never really resolve all our karma - talk about the Twilight Zone.
Name: Book 10

text: Even for those on spiritual paths where a purification process facilitates the transcendence of all karma, a trap exists wherein the seeds of additional karma are continually fed to us.
Name: Book 10

text: Beginning the discourses or taking the workshop will release the individual from the tonal frequencies creating disharmonic vibrations within the Causal Body, and any karma requiring a return to hell will undergo purification.
Name: Book 10

text: In the process, damaged DNA will be repaired gradually, and the vibratory frequency will begin to increase in order that the individual will be able to exist in one of the higher dimensional realms.
Name: Book 10

text: Those who feel that they are shamanically adept enough to facilitate this for themselves should do so as soon as possible.
Name: Book 10

text: Finally, we must deal with our connection to the collective unconscious.
Name: Book 10

text: This means that we must come to view all the distractions of the world in terms of a trap that keeps us from perceiving and embracing the reality within.
Name: Book 10

text: This includes games of one-up-man-ship, table games, television, movies, video games, face book, and generally chasing tails with the puppies.
Name: Book 10

text: Furthermore, we must have a desire to transcend this world and all its distractions.
Name: Book 10

text: It may appear that this statement is redundant, but not everyone has a desire to move on from this realm.

frame.Frame: Cause  change  of  position  on  a  scale

Name: Book 10

text: The lower emotional passions keep many people preoccupied with this world, and with everyone in it.
Name: Book 10

text: Allow me to provide an analogy.
Name: Book 10

text: Many prisoners are released when their time is done, and discover that they no longer fit into society.
Name: Book 10

text: They have developed a whole new set of ethics, social morays, and view of reality.
Name: Book 10

text: They have become used to prisoner status and the social machinations that occur between captives and captors.
Name: Book 10

text: Thus, many of those who are released do what is required in getting them selves put back into prison, even though they hate being incarcerated.
Name: Book 10

text: Its the same thing for us.
Name: Book 10

text: We are accustomed to our environment, and we therefore tend to fear the prospect of having to adapt to a new one, especially if we havent turned within, and come to realize the Self.
Name: Book 10

text: Even though this hell is a constant struggle for segments of happiness, and even though most of us believe in a better life after death, we still kick and scream to stay here, regardless of how much we suffer.
Name: Book 10

text: Those with terminal illnesses will make poppers out of their families, taking shots that cost $20,000 to $30,000 per month, just for the hope of a few more months of life.
Name: Book 10

text: To sever our connection to the collective unconscious, we must lose our fear of what we perceive to be death, lose our attachment to this world, and lose our attachment to all the distractions of this world.
Name: Book 10

text: Finally, we must transcend the passions of lust (not just the sexual variety), envy, anger (associated with unfulfilled desires), greed and undue attachment.
Name: Book 10

text: These lower emotional passions keep us locked into the collective unconscious, because they provide the mud and dung within which we play like pigs.

frame.Frame: Cause  change  of  position  on  a  scale

Name: Book 10

text: Beyond the inner dialogue with our Higher Self, our inner connection will become fully developed through an alchemical process which releases us from another one of Dominions traps.
Name: Book 10

text: This trap consists of hydrogen electrons in water on the mental level, which effectuate DNA degeneration when we attempt to reconstruct severed DNA strands separating us from the Higher Self.
Name: Book 10

text: In order to benefit from the alchemical process, we must first come to realize that the seeming dichotomy between what we have perceived to be good and evil does not actually exist.
Name: Book 10

text: This does not negate positive (beneficial) and negative (detrimental).
Name: Book 10

text: For example, existence outside Dominions hell is a positive experience, while existence in hell is negative.
Name: Book 10

text: All things are part and parcel of the All, however, and the All simply is.
Name: Book 10

text: Therefore, we shouldnt view Dominion as being evil.
Name: Book 10

text: When we have purified the lower emotional passions, we will be able to perceive him exactly as he is, make proper decisions regarding him if and when necessary, and even fight against him and his forces if we so choose.
Name: Book 10

text: But we will do so with full realization of the fact that Dominion himself does not constitute an evil force separate and distinct from the All.
Name: Book 10

text: For some, this will translate into just so much nonsense, but as we progress on the path, and begin to embrace the reality within, our capacity for abstract concepts will increase.
Name: Book 10

text: Along these same lines, we should be cognizant of the fact that the light which is refracted through our ionosphere is distorted, creating disharmonic tonal frequencies, and causing interference which limits the Higher Self in the communication process.
Name: Book 10

text: Without going into more detail, suffice it for me to say that this additional trap (compliments of Dominion) will be dealt with for those who contact the Mani-Om-Sah Institute, at maniomsah.
Name: Book 10

text: com.
Name: Book 10

text: Again, those who feel that they are sufficiently adept as to not require assistance with this process are free to utilize this information in effectuating their own freedom.
Name: Book 10

text: When we begin the path, the thymus chakra is stimulated, and a built-in trap causes it to send out a message that says: Hey, I have nothing to do.
Name: Book 10

text: In response, the universe (and society in particular) tries to occupy all our time, and we find it very difficult to find the time required for turning inward.
Name: Book 10

text: This issue will also be dealt with, but initially, the Higher Self may use it to determine to what extent the physical consciousness really desires spiritual freedom.
Name: Book 10

text: We must keep in mind that as conscious beings, we constitute the ego-self.
Name: Book 10

text: Since the ego-self cannot purify itself, we shouldnt get caught up in all the New Age systems of self-purification.
Name: Book 10

text: These systems constitute another trap which keeps us turning outward, rather than within.
Name: Book 10

text: All we need to do after our process begins, is stay focused within, continue to meditate, and practice the art of emotional detachment.
Name: Book 10

text: We must turn our lives over to the Higher Self, and quit trying to be the Captain of the ship.
Name: Book 10

text: This is called Self-surrender, and sometimes, Walking in the Spirit.
Name: Book 10

text: If we fail to accomplish this, we will undoubtedly fall under the spell of lifes distractions once again, and our processes of purification and increasing vibratory frequency will come to a halt.
Name: Book 10

text: This is why most people need a guru, even though none is actually required.
Name: Book 10

text: Enlightenment involves recognition of our trap, perceiving the illusion, dispelling the illusion, and achieving detachment from this world, its many distractions, and the lower emotional passions.
Name: Book 10

text: A oneness with the Higher Self or Father if you will is integral to this process.
Name: Book 10

text: Being someones sheep, and becoming as little children is not conducive to enlightenment.
Name: Book 10

text: This is the truth that will set us free.
Name: Book 10

text: CHAPTER: 7 WHO ARE OUR ENEMIES.
Name: Book 10

text: In Christianity, the enemy has been presented in a three-fold working model.
Name: Book 10
