text: Vibratory Harmony to the Sound  Current 17.
Name: Book 10

text: Position on the Light/Sound Spectrum Since the All exists outside our universe, It may be perceived as the Root of all life through time.
Name: Book 10

text: In fact it has been said that: The All is like time, but this concept should not be confused with the manifestation of time.
Name: Book 10

text: All time is here and now, within the All.
Name: Book 10

text: All of life is made up of Light and Sound which, within the All, are all in one.
Name: Book 10

text: In the All, all things are combined, then.
Name: Book 10

text: For this reason, Odin said: The All can only be hinted at; It can never be put into words.
Name: Book 10

text: It only expresses itself; and when it does so, the expression is.
Name: Book 10

text: As quanta, Sound and Light constitute particles smaller than those making up atoms.
Name: Book 10

text: They are units of electro-tonal energy-identity, called Partiki.
Name: Book 10

text: The Sound is particum, and the Light is partika-together, they are Partiki, and do not become dichotomized until their manifestation in the material worlds of dualism.
Name: Book 10

text: This is multidimensional Light-Sound consciousness, serving as the organizational and mechanical life-force of all intelligence, and its many manifestations.
Name: Book 10

text: Since everything has its existence in the All, everything is of this consciousness-everything in existence possesses consciousness, regardless of how rudimentary it may be.
Name: Book 10

text: Given its impetus from the All, Partiki travels from that source, to the universe, finally entering our solar system through the sun.
Name: Book 10

text: The motion of the Partiki as it travels through the mass of its own structure, causes a roiling, which produces friction, magnification, and expansion.
Name: Book 10

text: Within the highest vibratory frequencies of the universe called the spiritual planes, Sound and Light are expressed in unison, by tonal frequency.
Name: Book 10

text: Qualified on the Sound/Light spectrum, color and sound always accompany one another in those realms.
Name: Book 10

text: The spiritual realms are separated from the material worlds of dualism, by a Great Abyss, often referred to as the Void.
Name: Book 10

text: This is an area of pure Sound through which, the Partiki must pass in its movement throughout all dimensions of the universe, as it both creates and maintains it.
Name: Book 10

text: As the Partiki passes through the Void, it is split into its component parts of Sound and Light, with Sound forming a matrix upon which, manifested creation occurs, as Light passes through it.
Name: Book 10

text: This, in and of itself, constitutes a part of creation, which results from what we call the Higher Will.
Name: Book 10

text: The primal manifestation of this Higher Will, are the Runic Lights of Existence.
Name: Book 10

text: Being the first expressions of the All, they can be said to constitute the very fabric of existence.
Name: Book 10

text: Collectively, they lend substance, structure, and stability to the Cosmological Code.
Name: Book 10

text: Well get to this code in a minute, but first allow me to explain a little more regarding the Runic Lights.
Name: Book 10

text: Since enemies of the All have established a false system, my explanation must necessarily describe that one as well.
Name: Book 10

text: The New Age movement is guided by those who are attempting to control the spiritual evolution of humankind.
Name: Book 10

text: They teach of what they call the Seven Rays, and have even placed a so-called Lord or Cohan over each one.
Name: Book 10

text: In actuality, these rays are only emanations of the Runic Lights of Existence, and there are nine of them-not seven.
Name: Book 10

text: In addition, the descriptions of these rays/lights have been distorted to conform to a tradition dedicated to misleading those who are finding their way out of hell.
Name: Book 10

text: First of all, there were never any entities designated as Lords over the Runic Lights of Existence.
Name: Book 10

text: These Lights are special emissaries of the All.
Name: Book 10

text: As direct extensions, they need not, and cannot be overseen by sentient humanoid beings, regardless of any beings supposed stature among mankind.
Name: Book 10

text: Secondly, the New Age movement has distorted the original concepts, omitted the colors gold and orange, and turned red into pink.
Name: Book 10

text: It is significant that the orange light is responsible for organization in the universe, while the gold is a direct manifestation of the All, Itself.
Name: Book 10

text: Could it be, then, that those controlling the New Age movement are the agents of chaos in our universe.
Name: Book 10

text: As it turns out, this is indeed the case.
Name: Book 10

text: Following, is a basic description of the 7 rays as they commonly appear: 1st Ray, Color Blue, Meaning: Strength and resiliency, Lord/Cohan: Master Morya 2nd Ray, Color: Yellow, Meaning: Wisdom, Lord/Cohan: Lord Lanto 3rd Ray, Color: Pink, Meaning: Love, Lord/Cohan: Lady Nada 4th Ray, Color: White, Meaning: Purity/embodies all other rays, Lord/Cohan: Serapis Bey 5th Ray, Color: Green, Meaning: Healing, Lord/Cohan: Hilarian 6th Ray, Color: Purple, Meaning: Revelation, Lord/Cohan: Paul the Venetian 7th Ray, Color: Violet, Meaning: Freedom/warrior, Lord/Cohan: St.
Name: Book 10

text: Germain.
Name: Book 10

text: Following are the Runic Lights:.
Name: Book 10

text: Color: 1st Gold, Rune:  B, Meaning: Higher Will/Represents the All Color: 2nd Blue, Rune:  L, Meaning: Light (quanta) Color: 3rd Red, Rune:   S, Meaning: Sound (quanta) Color: 4th Violet, Rune:   B, Meaning: Balance of Sound & Light/ transformation Color: 5th, White  S, Meaning: Embodies all other lights/ Interdimensional links Color: 6th Purple, Rune:   L, Meaning: Life energy Color: 7th Green, Rune:  L, Meaning: Regeneration Color: 8th Orange, Rune:  S, Meaning: Organization Color: 9th Yellow, Rune:  B, Meaning: Unified Whole/Oneness of all creation.
Name: Book 10

text: As I stated above, the Runic Lights lend substance, structure and stability to the Cosmological Code, which is the structure of, and the impetus for the energetic effectuation of creation, structure, and evolution.
Name: Book 10

text: As can be seen above, nine Rune staves carry one each, of the Runic Lights.
Name: Book 10

text: These Runes, though, are only nine out of twenty-four, total.
Name: Book 10

text: All twenty-four make up the Cosmological Code, and establish what is called Cosmology.
Name: Book 10

text: Therefore, we first have the Runic Lights as extensions of the All; then we have the Cosmological Code, followed by Runic Cosmology, which is the actualization of creation, structure and evolution; and finally, we have the establishment of the elements of existence.
Name: Book 10

text: In order to understand the Cosmological Code(s), we must first understand Runic Correlation.
Name: Book 10

text: As extensions of the All, the Runes constitute the forces of the universe, as we know.
Name: Book 10

text: The twenty-four Runes of the Elder Futhark are listed in three ttir.
Name: Book 10

text: The first tt is that of creation; the second is the structure of the universe; and the third is evolution, which relates to the cycles of creation/birth, growth and renewal: Creation Feyhju : Urur (U): Thurisar: nsur (A): Reinu: Knkennu: Gebor: Vunjo:.
Name: Book 10

text: Structure Hagalar: Nthir: Isar (I): Jara: var: Pethro: Algir: Sol:.
Name: Book 10

text: Evolution Tivar: Bjrkan: Ehst (E): Manar: Lkar: Ingvar: Daku: Othalar (O): These categories are of significance in conceptualizing the role each Rune plays in the context of its general concepts and esoteric aspects; but as we shall see, they all play a role in creation.
Name: Book 10

text: By way of correlation, we will come to understand runic functions, and thus, to gain a conceptual awareness of how it is that the All, through these universal forces, effectuates not only creation, but also every other function in the universe.
Name: Book 10

text: As vowels in any language cement all words together to form a phonetic cohesiveness, so too, do the vowel Runes of the Elder Futhark (,, ,,) cement it together into a cohesive working whole, with Sol as the axis.
Name: Book 10

text: The Runes represent, then, what can be termed The Magical Language of the Universe, with Sol lending its support to each of the vowel Runes, or primaries as we often refer to them.
Name: Book 10

text: This language is how the All communicates itself to us.
Name: Book 10

text: Through an understanding of each Runes function, and through runic attunement, the initiate on the path not only gathers information on the proper use of the Runes, but also learns how to properly communicate with the All.
Name: Book 10

text: The Runic Correlation Chart is divided into five spheres of influence with each set of Runes connected to the primary through mode of operation:.
Name: Book 10

text: Runic Correlation has its application to our development on the path of enlightenment and transcendence, but what we are looking for here, is its application to creation.
Name: Book 10

text: Each sphere is based on a primary Rune, which in turn, receives its objective from Sol.
Name: Book 10

text: - Isars objective as the primary Rune in the sphere of Energys origin is to manifest the basis upon which creation is founded, and to still the energies of her two very powerful satellites, when required.
Name: Book 10

text: Light is first, and self-perpetuating.
Name: Book 10

text: Isar controls, because she magnifies Light.
Name: Book 10

text: The only Runic forces she does not control are those of Sol, because he is the direct extension of the All, which is the source of Light.
Name: Book 10

text: Although Isar controls all the other Runes, the most interesting relationship of this nature, is her control of Thurisar -.
Name: Book 10

text: As the 3rd Runic Light which is red, he embodies the subatomic structure of all existence, which is Sound.
Name: Book 10

text: Therefore, one might reason that Thurisar is out of the realm of Light, and therefore, remains autonomous.
Name: Book 10

text: Isars energetic connection, however, is through Sound, since she embodies both Light and Sound.
Name: Book 10

text: She controls Thurisar through her ability to magnify more or less Light, which he depends on for his manifestation.
Name: Book 10

text: The Sound Matrix, after all, is but a magnification of Light.
Name: Book 10

text: Isars other satellite is Reinu - , who directs all movement in the universe.
Name: Book 10

text: The ongoing creation manifesting in all evolutionary processes, then, is entirely under his direction.
Name: Book 10

text: Reinu provides the vehicle when we are accessing either the past, or the future time tracks.
Name: Book 10

text: As an individual power, he maintains his own rhythm independently of outside forces, which makes him the director of all movement in the universe.
Name: Book 10

text: He, who controls rhythmic structures, controls the direction of movement.
Name: Book 10

text: This principle can be seen in music, where the rhythmic structure carried by the rhythm section of a band determines the movements of the other instruments.
Name: Book 10

text: This power, coupled with Reinus independent access to both past and future, provides him with the power to alter the cycles of time and manifestation.
Name: Book 10

text: Isar represents the present aspect of universal structure, or that which is becoming.
Name: Book 10

text: Thus, she embodies the unstable ground of transition between the past and future, and has the power to control Reinus manipulations of the cycles of time and manifestation, by stilling the passage of time.
Name: Book 10

text: - Ururs objective as the primary Rune in the sphere of renewal is to determine and organize the nature, intent, and shape of all the realms of various vibratory frequencies in the universe, all the types of matter associated with those realms, and all their manifested structures, including sentient beings.
Name: Book 10

text: As the 8th Runic Light which is orange, he organizes all patterns of the universe, which are established by Sol.
Name: Book 10

text: Hagalar -  provides the force which becomes the pattern, making him the Primal Crystal.
Name: Book 10

text: This is the foundation of all creation, then, after the establishment of the Sound Matrix/Current.
Name: Book 10

text: This is also the primal archetype which lends itself to the renewal of all structures in the universe.
Name: Book 10

text: Renewal begins with the Need Rune, which is Nthir -.
Name: Book 10

text: Embodying the concept of future possibilities, he empowers all energetic structures with strength, the will to acquire, and a propensity for attainment, which is the foundation of all that which brings renewal.
Name: Book 10

text: As the 6th Runic Light which is purple, Lkar -  provides life energy, by unlocking the passageways from dimension-to-dimension, throughout the universe.
Name: Book 10

text: Since all life forms are constructs of Partiki, all life energy, then, is conscious.
Name: Book 10

text: Lkar is the modem for the passage of events through the ever-evolving constructs of life energy, and thus, he controls the events which all life forms experience.
Name: Book 10

text: In other words, we receive renewal by receiving life energy which is conscious, as we are conscious beings of life energy, ourselves.
Name: Book 10

text: This is the highest level of the principle that in order for one life-form to survive, another must become its sustenance.
Name: Book 10

text: In reality, no life-form ever ceases to exist.
Name: Book 10

text: We witness this universal principle every day of our lives as nature moves through its cycles.
Name: Book 10

text: Every beast, bird, fish, plant, and mineral exists within the food chain, at one level or another.
Name: Book 10

text: In order for humans to live, some other species-even if its only a plant-must die.
Name: Book 10

text: Religions have programmed us to view this phenomenon in negative terms.
Name: Book 10

text: Some teach that to kill for ones own sustenance is wrong, while others condone sustenance, while denouncing the killing of others for safety reasons.
Name: Book 10

text: Most allow killing as long as it is necessary, especially if it is sanctioned by government; but they still possess a fear of Gods wrath, if they make the decision themselves.
Name: Book 10

text: They maintain the idea that God looks upon killing with disfavor, and would rather have total peace and harmony (take, for example, the Christian prophecy of the lion and the lamb lying down together, as though such constitutes Gods true will).
Name: Book 10

text: In reality, as I stated above, no life-form ever dies; therefore, no life-form is ever missed by the All.
Name: Book 10

text: To view the physical body as being the life-form we know is to err.
Name: Book 10

text: Even the life-form, or intelligence making up each cell of the body, is released as the form decays, but never really dies.
Name: Book 10

text: Renewal also implies corrective measures intended to provide guidance toward that which would constitute renewal, as opposed to degeneration.
Name: Book 10

text: Pethro - , therefore, provides the principle of rlg, or Karma, which is often referred to in terms of fate.
Name: Book 10

text: This principle, regardless of how rudimentary its manifestation may be, forms the structure of experience for all forms of life, from the mineral kingdom, up.
Name: Book 10

text: Our rlg is the manifestation of energies we have harbored, which our Norse ancestors called wyrd.
Name: Book 10

text: By reshaping our wyrd on a daily basis, Bjrkan -  provides a cyclic pattern for our inner development.
Name: Book 10

text: In this way, she embodies the cycles of birth, growth and renewal.
Name: Book 10

text: - Othalars objective as the Primary Rune in the Sphere of Universal Manifestation is to provide the power required for all runic activities and their manifestations.
Name: Book 10

text: Her very stable, electric charge is used in bind with Ingvar -  for creating electromagnetic fields of energy required for the manifestation of all creation.
Name: Book 10

text: Ingvar provides for all genetic structures and makes all connections to the Sound Matrix, while Othalar maintains and/or increases vibratory frequencies as required in all evolutionary processes.
Name: Book 10

text: Ingvar also establishes the Sound Matrix through which, Othalar increases the frequency of Light in forming the DNA template responsible for all temporal manifestations.
Name: Book 10

text: The power which caused the ordered universe to come into existence is known as Feyhju -.
Name: Book 10

text: All things in the universe are made from a combination of Sound and Light, which she embodies.
Name: Book 10

text: This makes Feyhju the primordial fire of creation.
Name: Book 10

text: As a universal force, she provides a vehicle for the expression of the Higher Will.
Name: Book 10

text: As the 4th Runic Light which is violet, Tivar -  provides a balance of Sound and Light, which allows for transformation in all ways, and on all levels.
Name: Book 10

text: Light and Sound are sub-units of crystalline morphogenetic substance, which serve as the blueprints for all manifested creation.
Name: Book 10

text: When balanced, then, manifested creations are able to transform as required, in adapting to evolutionary changes.
Name: Book 10

text: Jara -  , which is the 2nd Runic Light (Blue), embodies the light aspect of creation.
Name: Book 10

text: As her Light passes through the Sound Matrix, the potential manifestations materialize, and all things, including time are manifested.
Name: Book 10

text: Jara establishes both, the elements of Light, and the cyclic pattern inherent throughout all of creation; thus, she governs the galactic cycles of the zodiac, as well as the planetary cycles of the seasons.
Name: Book 10

text: As the planets move around the sun in accord with the galactic and solar cycles, so does the illusion of time manifest through the seasons which result from the cyclic movement of the planets in our solar system.
Name: Book 10

text: Moreover, Sound is a loop.
Name: Book 10

text: Jara establishes time as her Light passes through the Sound Matrix, establishing time on the matrix.
Name: Book 10

text: Time, then, is also a loop.
Name: Book 10

text: The cyclic processes established by Jara, are administered by Daku - , as he brings one cyclic process to a close, and allows for a smooth transition into another.
Name: Book 10

text: Many people are aware of the concept of the River of Life, which embodies the souls of eternal existence.
Name: Book 10

text: Daku, however, embodies a more transcendental concept called the River of Time.
Name: Book 10

text: This river embodies the eternal existence experienced by vital souls.
Name: Book 10

text: An explanation follows: All life can be viewed as a droplet of water rushing with the current.
Name: Book 10

text: Time seems to pass by, but the current remains the same.
Name: Book 10

text: The droplet remains in the moment of being, or the ever-present here and now.
Name: Book 10

text: As this present moment continually passes away, awareness of being is always new.
Name: Book 10

text: Therefore, all life occurs in a moment of time.
Name: Book 10

text: As the water droplet is perceived in the moment of being, the moment of being itself, is perceived at the point between light and dark.
Name: Book 10

text: This is where all space and time meet in the here and now.
Name: Book 10

text: - Ehsts objective as the Primary Rune in the Sphere of the Unified Whole, is to establish all of creation as one unified whole, and to provide a basis for the Interdimensional links which maintain the unified whole.
Name: Book 10

text: As the 5th Runic Light which is white, Ehst performs this duty, establishing the oneness of all creation, known otherwise, as the Odinic Principle.
Name: Book 10

text: To understand Odin in a transcendental sense, we must come to terms with three perceptions: A.
Name: Book 10

text: The perception of reality beyond the cycles of time and manifestation.
Name: Book 10

text: A perception of the passage of events as ever-evolving constructs of life - Energy.
Name: Book 10

text: A perception of Sound in terms of transition through perceptual awareness, and as the vehicle of conscious experience of varying spacial phenomena which, in reality, all share the same space and time.
Name: Book 10

text: Before examining these three aspects in greater detail, allow me first, to clarify my use of the phrase, perceptual awareness.
Name: Book 10

text: This is not a redundancy, but rather a means by which the seemingly inexplicable may be explained.
Name: Book 10

text: As we know, to be aware of something is to have knowledge or cognizance-to be mindful of it.
Name: Book 10

text: To perceive, we know, is to become aware through the senses.
Name: Book 10

text: However, my use of the term involves a psychic, or even spiritual sense, rather than one of the five standard senses through which we normally gain perception.
Name: Book 10

text: For this reason, I separate the terms perception and awareness, in order to emphasize the fact of a perception which transcends awareness, and adds an unusual element of cognizance to it.
Name: Book 10

text: A: Odin exists in part, as the perceptual awareness of the cycles of time and manifestation.
Name: Book 10

text: These involve the cycles of days, months, seasons, and years, which manifest changes in weather, temperature, and natures other processes.
Name: Book 10

text: They manifest the effects of life experiences, chemical chain reactions, and age.
Name: Book 10

text: Reality beyond these cycles is perceived in the awareness that whatever we want to exist, or be, already exists within us as the within aspect of the All.
Name: Book 10

text: The principle that the entire universe is within us, applies to all conditions and situations, as well as to time and space.
Name: Book 10

text: We cannot take control of this fact, however, until spiritual purification is complete.
Name: Book 10

text: We learn through shamanic travel, that we can experience the reality of other worlds, as well as other times, through our own inner sanctums.
Name: Book 10

text: Therefore, unlike those whose consciousnesses are captivated by the cycles of time and manifestation, we can perceive the reality beyond.
Name: Book 10

text: B: Each moment of being changes at the speed of light.
Name: Book 10

text: Each abrupt change facilitates a power surge that we have come to know as The Power of Light.
Name: Book 10

text: As we also know, objects, emotions and mental constructs associated with events, maintain an existence within the overall Sound Matrix.
Name: Book 10

text: These constitute constructs of life-energy, because everything in existence is constructed of quanta, which are units of electro-tonal energy-identity.
Name: Book 10

text: This is how it can be said that God exists in everything, and at the same time, we are all a part of God.
Name: Book 10

text: This is the oneness of all creation.
Name: Book 10

text: Perceiving everything in the All-even events as consciousness, allows us to perceive the passage of events as ever-evolving constructs of life-energy.
Name: Book 10

text: C:  I reiterate:  Because all places and times exist within the Sound Matrix, everything is connected.
Name: Book 10

text: Variances in tonal frequency and vibratory consonance provide the appearance of what we call here and there; but we transcend this illusion through the experience of bilocation, where we perceive other places, while maintaining body consciousness.
Name: Book 10

text: These three perceptions constitute an understanding of Odin in a transcendental sense, which is required for our understanding of creation, and that which is created.
Name: Book 10

text: This is the Odinic principle, which operates through the Rune and Runic Light we know as Ehst.
Name: Book 10

text: In this way, all of creation is established as one unified whole.
Name: Book 10

text: The key to a timeless view of life is found in var -.
Name: Book 10

text: To understand life and death as a key to this view (for var represents life and death), we must first understand the paradox of life and death: Reincarnation is a cyclic process of Life and death; but accessing the Inner Worlds reveals the reality That life is death, and death is life.
Name: Book 10

text: The interconnectedness of all experiences and events throughout our existence is a reality which could not be, if the past and future did not have their existence in the here and now.
Name: Book 10

text: When we travel out of the body shamanically, we realize that we are.
Name: Book 10

text: even without the body.
Name: Book 10

text: When we access the inner worlds, we realize that life exists aside from this 3rd dimensional realm, and that we have many life experiences in the past, as well as in the future.
Name: Book 10

text: Thus, it becomes evident that life is death, and death is life, that although we experience death in one respect (that of the body), in reality, we never die.
Name: Book 10

text: Life, then, is timeless and vast.
Name: Book 10

text: var serves a special function for the All, by providing contact points throughout space/time.
Name: Book 10

text: These contact points establish an energetic link-up for every particle in the universe, which accounts for the fact observed by quantum physicists, of particles separated by many miles, nevertheless affecting one another.
Name: Book 10

text: This also accounts for so-called miraculous and timely occurrences which are often viewed as the hand of God in our personal matters.
Name: Book 10

text: These are Interdimensional Links, and could be considered the hand of God, since the Runic forces are extensions of the All.
Name: Book 10

text: Algir  reveals the timeless nature of life as we explore his structure as the inner aspect of all that which exists without.
Name: Book 10

text: The paradox is stated thusly: Whatever is without is also within.
Name: Book 10

text: All the vast planes of the universes, although having their existence in an empirical sense, also exist within us, as our inner worlds.
Name: Book 10

text: This has to do with the nature of the All who is both within and without.
Name: Book 10

text: It is accurate to say, then, that the entire universe is contained within us.
Name: Book 10

text: As an extension of the All-which is everything-the universal force we know as Algir, expresses and maintains this very important aspect of creation.
Name: Book 10

text: The foregoing analysis of the Cosmological Code as regards the Interdimensional, or Unified Whole Sphere, provides us with the understanding that creation involves more than just the manifestation of our sense-world.
Name: Book 10

text: It involves the normally unperceived reality of forces which establish the phenomena that shape our reality, but which we are never   aware of.
Name: Book 10

text: - nsurs objective as the Primary Rune in the Sphere of Creative Awareness is to express the electro-tonal energy-identity within a manifested form, in order that it may begin to gain experience in the material worlds of dualism.
Name: Book 10

text: This is the higher aspect of the self, which our Norse ancestors called the Hamingja.
Name: Book 10

text: We, as a physical consciousness, of course, are made up of material from the Mental, Causal, Astral, and Physical Planes of Existence.
Name: Book 10

text: Each cell, of which our bodies are comprised, contains a particle of electro-tonal energy-identity; but if our Hamingja were to depart, and break all connections, all the cells (the body), as well as the physical consciousness would die.
Name: Book 10

text: nsur, as a universal force, is our bridge to the All.
Name: Book 10

text: Likewise, he is the source of adhesion for the subtle forces which allow formation of the elements.
Name: Book 10

text: As such, he maintains the coalescence of existence in general, quantific processes in particular, and ultimately the expansive thought we call creative energy, creative awareness, or consciousness.
Name: Book 10

text: Without this source of adhesion and the resulting coalescence, dichotomies would fragment quantific structures before they could coalesce into patterns of thought, causation, and elemental force.
Name: Book 10

text: There would be no creative awareness.
Name: Book 10

text: Therefore, even the phenomenon of gravity owes its manifestation to the Rune nsur, ultimately.
Name: Book 10

text: Allow me to diverge for a moment, because gravity is part of creation, and must therefore, be discussed.
Name: Book 10

text: It is one of those forces in operation which cannot be called by a Rune-name, or even attributed to just one Rune.
Name: Book 10

text: Ill begin this discussion with a few definitions: Induction - 2.
Name: Book 10

text: [The process of electrical attraction] electric induction, magnetic induction, see electro-magnetic action.
Name: Book 10

text: Magnetism - A physical phenomenon produced by the motion of electric charge, which results in attractive and repulsive forces between objects.
Name: Book 10

text: Morphogenetic Field - The electromagnetic field encompassing planetary bodies, which is responsible for all evolutionary, energetic and elemental processes and forces.
Name: Book 10

text: Magnetic Field - A region around a magnetic material, or a moving electric charge within which the force of magnetism acts.
Name: Book 10

text: Morphogenetic fields fall into this category.
Name: Book 10

text: Harmonic - of or relating to musical harmony or harmonics Integument - A natural outer covering, such as the skin, or seed coat These dimensions (13-15) constitute the 5th Harmonic Universe, known as the spiritual planes.
Name: Book 10

text: In this realm, energy-identities acquire soul bodies on their way to the material worlds of dualism, in order to gain experience.
Name: Book 10

text: This is the anti-matter region of the universe, where elemental forces such as gravity do not function as they do in the material worlds.
Name: Book 10

text: Within morphogenetic fields, we have the magnetic induction of opposite spinning charges.
Name: Book 10

text: Therefore, when the moment of being changes at the speed of light, the resulting power surge causes a synthesis of particum and partika (Sound and Light), which creates its own electromagnetic pulse, thus producing magnetism.
Name: Book 10

text: This is an electrical attraction which occurs with the magnetic induction of opposite spinning charges naturally inherent within morphogenetic fields.
Name: Book 10

text: For this reason, gravity is specific to planetary spheres, where magnetic induction is occurring.
Name: Book 10

text: Therefore, it is accurate to say that gravity is synonymous with electric energy.
Name: Book 10

text: It is also cyclic in nature, since it occurs with each E.
Name: Book 10

text: pulse as each moment of being changes at the speed of light.
Name: Book 10

text: This also means, then, that gravity occurs at the speed of light.
Name: Book 10

text: - Daku is the Primary Rune of gravity, because he produces the power surge we call the Power of Light, which causes a synthesis of Sound and Light which results in the E.
Name: Book 10

text: Pulse responsible for the production of magnetism.
Name: Book 10

text: - Knkennu is the impetus for energys origin, setting cycles into play, and providing Daku with his impetus.
Name: Book 10

text: - Urur organizes these cycles, providing the cyclic power of Transformation which results from the synchronization of the power surge and the E.
Name: Book 10

text: pulse.
Name: Book 10

text: This is a transformation of magnetic induction, the flux of time, Sound, and Light in gravity.
Name: Book 10

text: nsur, of course, plays his role, as noted above.
Name: Book 10

text: The controlled energetic impetus behind the cycles of creation is Knkennu -.

Name: Book 10

text: Knkennu embodies controlled energy, and therefore, provides a controlled energetic impetus, as an extension of the All.
Name: Book 10

text: He controls the sun in our solar system as a microcosm, as well as the larger microcosm of the Galaxies.
Name: Book 10

text: The macrocosm, of course, is the All, itself.
Name: Book 10

text: The transformative and regenerative aspects of Knkennu provide an impetus which maintains the cyclic processes that are initiated by Jara in the universe.
Name: Book 10

text: Specifically, all cyclic processes depend on gravitational fields, density of celestial bodies, and the efficiency of E.

text: Perfect unity involves an identifiable whole, united, with all the required elements, qualities and characteristics for promoting the purposes of those sharing identity, consciousness, and uniqueness.

text: This is what the universal force of Vunjo  is all about.
Name: Book 10

text: She is the mother of Unified Consciousness, constituting a oneness of perception; or awareness of something shared by a group.
Name: Book 10

text: The oneness of all creation means that we are all one in the All.
Name: Book 10

text: It also refers to the fact that we are all interconnected by the Sound Matrix, with Light manifesting space between objects.
Name: Book 10

text: On the other hand, we all have personal identity in accordance with our particular vibratory harmony to the Sound current.
Name: Book 10

text: Personal identity establishes personal characteristics, which manifest in a given nature, and finally result in the experiences that accompany the actions that are natural to the individual.
Name: Book 10

text: Those with similar vibratory harmonies to the Sound Current, naturally share characteristics and perceptions in common.
Name: Book 10

text: They constitute, then, specific groups.
Name: Book 10

text: Vunjo is the mother of diversity in the universe, and although we constitute a unified whole in one respect, she maintains the diversity we see in the world.
Name: Book 10

text: Birds, for instance, constitute a group, but consist of various groups, or species which do not attempt to mate, nor do they even share the same trees.
Name: Book 10

text: This is what the natural creative force of Vunjo is all about.
Name: Book 10

text: She establishes unity, forming the whole; while its oneness is unique in identity and consciousness, to a specified group.
Name: Book 10

text: There exists a vaporous light between all elements, manifested bodies, and even between earth, air, fire and water, where energetic exchanges occur.
Name: Book 10

text: Opposite but equal reactions set up the process of evolutionary change, but Gebor  serves as the balance point between all things in creation, assuring that creation is an ongoing process.
Name: Book 10

text: As the 9th Runic Light which is yellow, Gebor exists in the Sphere of Creative Awareness, while governing the Sphere of the Unified Whole.
Name: Book 10

text: Allowing various groups (life forms in general, species, and even gestalts) their autonomous natures as guaranteed by Vunjo, Gebor maintains the Unified Whole as established by the sphere of that appellation.
Name: Book 10

text: In the All, or in the nd (Sound-Light Matrix), all things are one, as we know.
Name: Book 10

text: Only a vaporous light marks the dividing line between things, which are actually manifestations of various vibratory harmonics to the Sound Current.
Name: Book 10

text: This vaporous Light is where energetic exchanges occur, whether between objects, or between water, air and fire-fire, earth and air.
Name: Book 10

text: The most important energetic exchanges occurring, are: 1) desire and abhorrence; 2) attachment and indifference; 3) cheerfulness and despondence; 4) happiness and sorrow; 5) forbearance and anger; 6) bravery and fear; 7) trust and jealousy; 8) love and hate; 9) selflessness and selfishness.
Name: Book 10

text: Vapor Light is light quanta vibrating at a higher frequency than that of the elements it separates.
Name: Book 10

text: It is auric in nature, but less sophisticated than the auras of humans and animals.
Name: Book 10

text: Everything in existence is conscious, regardless of how rudimentary the consciousness may be.
Name: Book 10

text: All consciousness possesses the Vapor Light.
Name: Book 10

text: At the elemental level, exchanges through the vapor light occur in the way of natures processes, which I have expressed in terms of: Water, Air and Fire-Fire, Earth and Air.
Name: Book 10

text: Water exchanges with air.
Name: Book 10

text: (Water contains oxygen, and air absorbs water - evaporation) 2.
Name: Book 10

text: Air exchanges with fire.
Name: Book 10

text: (Air feeds fire, and fire expands air) 3.
Name: Book 10

Name: Book 10

text: (Earth feeds fire, and fire renews earth) 4.
Name: Book 10

text: Earth exchanges with air.
Name: Book 10

text: (Earth consumes air, and air has its creation in earth) Gebor, then, maintains balance throughout the cosmos, and thereby assures the energetic exchanges responsible for the ongoing creation through the process of evolutionary change.
Name: Book 10

text: Let us not confuse this process with the present-day concept of evolution, which claims that we descended from apes.
Name: Book 10

text: That which I have presented here, is in the realm of cosmology, and has nothing to do with the convoluted notions of those with dishonorable designs against those of us, who have a desire to know.
Name: Book 10

text: The ongoing creation with all its evolutionary processes culminates in Spiritual Intelligence.
Name: Book 10

text: My use of the term culminate, should not be construed to mean that the ongoing creation stops.
Name: Book 10

text: Culmination is an individualistic phenomenon, which simply places the individual within a higher classification of continual creation.
Name: Book 10

text: The universal force responsible for this aspect of creation is known to us as Manar - Spiritual intelligence involves much more than an understanding of laws governing moral behavior, esoteric precepts, or even knowledge of how scientific and spiritual principles are related.
Name: Book 10

text: It involves a conceptual awareness of the transcendental concepts associated with quantific processes that are involved in the cosmology of the universe, and the Cosmological Codes.
Name: Book 10

text: Such awareness is required for functioning in the service of the All, as a Silent One.
Name: Book 10

text: To become a Silent One is a very high aspiration for some of those who escape from hell.
Name: Book 10

text: Toward this end, Manar makes available to those who are dedicated, the rationality and alignment of the personal psyche/soul structure with the Hamingja, and balance between the human and divine aspects of our being.
Name: Book 10

text: This aspect of creation brings about the eventual completeness of everything established by the All.
Name: Book 10

text: To understand creation in terms of elemental structures, and the developmental/evolutionary processes which govern them, it is important to realize that: 1) There are 144,000 stages of existence; 2) There are nine divisions of each stage; and 3) For each of these nine divisions, there are eight phases of transitional harmonic frequency which produce the impetus for evolution within each and every dimension of the universe.
Name: Book 10

text: Actually there is one phase per division for the first eight.
Name: Book 10

text: The ninth division is one of transformation, wherein elemental structures undergo all eight phases again.
Name: Book 10

text: The aspects of the impetus produced, may be described thusly: Phase-1: Frequency signature acquisition.
Name: Book 10

text: We each possess our own unique signature, which changes throughout our evolutionary transitions.
Name: Book 10

text: Phase-2: Pitch adjustment of the morphogenetic seed crystals.
Name: Book 10

text: This is a slight alteration resulting from the activity in Phase-1.
Name: Book 10

text: The seed crystals provide attunement between the morphogenetic/auric field, and the Sound Current.
Name: Book 10

text: Phase-3: Speed-up in the vibratory frequency of the Morphogenetic chakras/hvels.
Name: Book 10

text: This provides the frequency requirements for ascension from one elemental state of existence, to another.
Name: Book 10

text: Phase-4: Speed-up in the vibratory frequency of the soul essence/Hamingja.
Name: Book 10

text: Phase-5: Speed-up in the vibratory frequency of the mental body.
Name: Book 10

text: Phase-6: Speed-up in the frequency of the causal body.
Name: Book 10

text: Phase-7: speed-up in the frequency of the astral body.
Name: Book 10

text: Phase-8: Structural development of the DNA Template/Lower Etheric Energy Matrix (Hamr).
Name: Book 10

text: As I noted earlier, Runic Cosmology follows the Code as the actualization of creation, structure, and evolution; then the process (as intended) establishes the elements of existence.
Name: Book 10

text: Unknown to modern-day scientists, is the fact that there exists 540 elements, which in various combinations, as we know, produce molecular structures of gases, liquids and solids.
Name: Book 10

text: Ultimately, we experience the elements in terms of earth, air, fire and water.
Name: Book 10

text: Obviously, these four divisions do not depend on specific elements for their existence.
Name: Book 10

text: In other words, we are not going to find certain elements, such as hydrogen or chromium in one of the divisions, and never find it in one of the others.
Name: Book 10

text: Earth, air, fire and water simply describe the form that elements may take.
Name: Book 10

text: Those in the form of large molecular structures are said to constitute the earth element.
Name: Book 10

text: Those in the form of smaller molecular structures (also known as colloids), are said to constitute the water element when dispersed in water.
Name: Book 10

text: Hydrogen and oxygen combined, however, form the water element themselves-but only when a catalyst, such as a high voltage spark, or palladium is introduced.
Name: Book 10

text: Those elements that form gases, are of the air element; but what about fire.
Name: Book 10

text: Fire is a rapid chemical chain reaction.
Name: Book 10

text: Essentially, we are talking about oxidation, where an elements atoms lose electrons in reaction to being combined with oxygen.
Name: Book 10

text: Therefore, while earth, air, and water constitute relatively stable forms that elements may take, fire is not stable in the least bit.
Name: Book 10

text: It constitutes an elemental form that is in constant flux; it is a transitional form by which action, the earth forms are converted into the air forms.
Name: Book 10

text: It is common to find systems where in each of the four elemental designations is embodied by a particular Rune.
Name: Book 10

text: As I have discussed elsewhere, however, the Runes cannot be compartmentalized in such a strict manner.
Name: Book 10

text: Each one, in fact, embodies all the elements, and will express one over the others, depending on its mode of operation at the time.
Name: Book 10

text: Furthermore, the elements work together harmoniously at the cosmological level, as can be seen in runic activity.
Name: Book 10

text: Scientists have discovered some of these interesting facts, such as water requiring fire in its creation.
Name: Book 10

text: We can take a sphere and place within it, two parts hydrogen with one part oxygen (H2O), and we will not produce water without a catalyst.
Name: Book 10

text: The earth element of palladium will work, or the fire element of a high voltage spark will do the same thing.
Name: Book 10

text: Amino acids which are building blocks of biological forms, can be created in a sphere by combining the requisite gases (air element), and introducing a high voltage spark.
Name: Book 10

text: It would be ludicrous to consider scientists in the light of creators, even if they did end up creating biological forms.
Name: Book 10

text: As we have seen, they can only rely on the established creative processes which already exist for their use.
Name: Book 10

text: Creation, after all, encompasses all the quantific processes responsible for electro-tonal identities, evolutionary processes of a cosmological, as well as a biological nature, and all the forces of adhesion, cohesion and balance, which allow for the eventual manifestation of elemental biological forms.
Name: Book 10

text: It is equally ludicrous, then, to say that a very powerful humanoid called god said a few words, and created the world in five days, then drew in the dirt, and manifested human beings by blowing into it.
Name: Book 10

text: As the force behind all power in the universe-even that of Sound and Light-the Higher Will serves as the ultimate force of ordered existence.
Name: Book 10

text: Embodying this force which our Norse ancestors called Megin, is Sol ; the Runic representative of the All.
Name: Book 10

text: A number of educators have confused this power with the nd, using the two terms interchangeably.
Name: Book 10

text: nd is Feyhjus power of Sound and Light, which is a creative force.
Name: Book 10

text: It is the Partiki which serves as material for the patterns of all universes, and the manifestations which comprise them; but Sol, with his Megin, establishes the patterns of all the universes.
Name: Book 10

text: Megin is the power behind Light and Sound; it is the power of the Higher Will, to which all other powers in the universe(s) are subordinate.
Name: Book 10

text: Naturally, then, Sol is the 1st Runic Light, which is Gold.
Name: Book 10

text: The Higher will is the structure of universal law, and the force behind all power in the universe.
Name: Book 10

text: This is the ultimate force of ordered existence we are talking about; and this is Soils cosmological purpose as the axis in the Runic Correlation chart which depicts the Cosmological Code, then.
Name: Book 10

text: Sol is the embodiment of the Higher Will, as a direct extension of the All.
Name: Book 10

text: He is the Force of Megin, which is the responsible force behind the structural patterns resulting from the activities of the other Runic Forces in the Cosmological Code.
Name: Book 10

text: The structural patterns which are powered by Soils force include the Sound current, the Runic Forces, personal identity and gender for electro-tonal energy-identities, the Cosmological Code, the planes of variable vibratory frequencies, and the elemental patterns of atomic, molecular, and biological manifestations.
Name: Book 10

text: As we know, each individual has personal identity as a result of his or her particular vibrational harmony to the Sound current, and the potential for individual harmonics is limitless.
Name: Book 10

text: We are categorized in all ways, by tonal frequency.
Name: Book 10

text: The Runic Forces possess specific characteristics that relate to what we call gender, and they also embody specific tonal frequencies, unlimited by our concept of octaves.
Name: Book 10

text: As the patterning force of the All, Sol has everything to do with personal identity and gender.
Name: Book 10

text: His patterning force provides the vibratory harmonic upon which, each and every individual receives gender through a specific Runic Force, while at the same time, receiving personal identity.
Name: Book 10

text: In this way, although the Sound Essence or Hamingja is of the spiritual planes beyond the realms of dualism, it nevertheless takes on either male or female characteristics upon its transition into the material worlds of dualism.
Name: Book 10

text: For this reason, a conscious entity will develop from one species to the next, then from one ascension or incarnation to the next as either male or female.
Name: Book 10

text: Sometimes ones past actions and/or attitudes necessitate a life experience in the opposite gender.
Name: Book 10

text: Such a situation is often the root, or karmic cause of homosexuality.
Name: Book 10

text: Therefore, when someone feels that he or she is trapped in the wrong body, it is probably true.
Name: Book 10

text: As I stated in chapter eight, we often have to deal with karma that is not ours, so the individual may not even be at fault.
Name: Book 10

text: As regards the creation of biological forms, there exists information which describes how quanta manifest DNA and cellular structures.
Name: Book 10

text: I will dispense with the details, because they are embroiled in physics-related terms such as 1) Universal Unified Field; 2)  Dimensional Unified Field; 3) Universal Merkaba Field; 4) Outer Auric Levels; 5) Morphogenetic Chakras; and 6) Morphogenetic Seed Crystals.

text: Well suffice it to say here, that from the bodies we inhabit, to the planetary spheres in all dimensions, to solar systems, galaxies, and even the universe itself, electromagnetic (E.

text: Specifically, we are talking about how the tonal pattern of incoming energy (electro-tonal identity) enters the Seed Crystal, and manifests itself in the DNA blueprint.
Name: Book 10

text: The process is eventually described in terms of how the energy-identity enters the auric capsules of the body, and is then drawn through the lower chakras (hvels) and into the energy meridians linked to the bodys nervous system.
Name: Book 10

text: From the nervous system, this energy passes into the endocrine system, the blood, and the cellular structure, to manifest form.
Name: Book 10

text: Biological form is created and sustained through this continual process of energy flow from the multi-dimensional, Unified Field.
Name: Book 10

text: Therefore, as more highly evolved entities, we inhabit bodies made up of other entities, or intelligences inhabiting the cells of the body.
Name: Book 10

text: The quantum physics are certainly real, but they offer very little in the way of understanding who we are, and what makes us what we are; therefore, it is of great significance to understand the structure of the various dimensions that we call planes.
Name: Book 10

text: Herein lays the source of the subtle bodies making up the Auric Field (known in Old Norse, as the Hugr).
Name: Book 10

text: These subtle bodies make up the mind, the subconscious/ unconscious, and the storehouse of our lower emotional passions.
Name: Book 10

text: This is what is generally left out of discussions such as the one above, regarding incoming energy-identities.
Name: Book 10

text: The DNA blueprint mentioned above exists as a shroud around the physical body.
Name: Book 10

text: Psychics, who claim to be able to view this, call it the Etheric Body, and state that it is the innermost layer of several, constituting the aura.
Name: Book 10

text: This is actually a Sound Matrix serving as a DNA template, from which the physical body is patterned, with DNA also manifesting in the cellular structure.
Name: Book 10

text: The Old Norse term for this is Hamr.
Name: Book 10

text: At a more subtle vibratory frequency than the Hamr, is the Astral Body which exists as a shroud for the Hamr.
Name: Book 10

text: This is where our emotional passions are stored as psychic energy.
Name: Book 10

text: At still a more subtle level, the Causal Body enshrouds the astral.
Name: Book 10

text: This constitutes the subconscious mind, which is a storehouse for all our past thoughts, emotional reactions to environmental stimuli, and the energetic structures from deeds performed.
Name: Book 10

text: These things constitute what our Norse ancestors called wyrd, which is the substance that manifests as rlg, or Karma.
Name: Book 10

text: At an even more subtle level is the Mental Body, enshrouding the causal.
Name: Book 10

text: This is the actual conscious mind itself.
Name: Book 10

text: This is where mental impressions and habits are stored.
Name: Book 10

text: That which we are, manifests through the Hugr, then.
Name: Book 10

text: Beyond this, we have present-life experiences that form who we are, with everything else providing an underlying ego structure which determines how we perceive and react to environmental stimuli.
Name: Book 10

text: Enshrouding the Mental Body is an Upper Etheric Sound Matrix responsible for the manifestation of the Mental, Causal and Astral Bodies.
Name: Book 10

text: These subtle bodies of the Hugr are part of their respective planes, or dimensions.
Name: Book 10

text: Many planes subdivide these general designations, so allow me to provide a brief description at this time.
Name: Book 10

text: In some circles, each general plane is referred to as a Harmonic Universe (noted as: HU).
Name: Book 10

text: Within each HU, there are three dimensional realms; and each of these contains its own Astral Plane.
Name: Book 10

text: Thus, each major plane (HU) consists of six sub-planes.
Name: Book 10

text: There are three dimensional realms, and three astral planes making up each one.
Name: Book 10

text: The numbers and letters in parentheses indicate the astral realm associated with the dimensional realm: HU-5, D-13 (13-A), D-14 (14-A), D15 (15-A) Soul Plane HU-4, D-10 (10-A), D-11 (11-A, )D-12 (12-A) Mental Plane HU-3, D-7 (7-A), D-8 (8-A), D-9 (9-A) Causal Plane HU-2, D-4 (4-A), D-5 (5-A), D-6 (6-A) Astral Plane HU-1, D-1 (1-A), D-2 (2-A), D-3 (3-A) Physical Plane The Hugr (auric field) consists of the Astral, Causal and Mental sheaths, or bodies associated with their respective planes of origin.

text: Each body consists of six vibratory sheaths.
Name: Book 10

Name: Book 10

text: Each of these has its own astral counterpart at a more subtle level.
Name: Book 10

Name: Book 10

text: Without going into detail regarding the exact nature of the various types of matter throughout the dimensional realms, Ill provide a basic description: D-1 is solid matter, D-2 is dense, and D-3 is rigid.
Name: Book 10

text: All these are atomic in their elemental nature.
Name: Book 10

text: D-4 is dark matter, D-5 is misty, and D-6 is Light matter.
Name: Book 10

Name: Book 10

Name: Book 10

text: All these are neutral in their elemental nature.
Name: Book 10

Name: Book 10

text: As we look around, perceiving the wonders of creation, we cant help but know that there is a God.
Name: Book 10

text: It is equally clear, however, that this creation could not possibly be the work of a humanoid god with mans propensity for jealousy and anger - the failings of the human intellect.
Name: Book 10

text: The All is in everything and beyond everything.
Name: Book 10

text: The Runes are a gestalt entity, functioning throughout all the universes, as an extension of the All.
Name: Book 10

text: The All is like a large sun, with five universes revolving around it, the same way the planets in our solar system revolve around our sun.
Name: Book 10

text: This is going on at three different vibratory levels, meaning that there are fifteen universes.
Name: Book 10

text: EPILOGUE I dont recommend that anyone jump up and quit his or her religion, because I am fully aware of the implications involving family and social ties.
Name: Book 10

text: There is no need to create riffs where none are needed, but at the same time, we must bear in mind, certain facts.
Name: Book 10

text: Just place these facts on a shelf in your mind, and dont worry about whether or not they are true.
Name: Book 10

text: Contemplate them on occasion, analyze the situations you encounter in life relative to them, and even engage in your own research.
Name: Book 10

text: When the time is right, you will know whether or not you can accept some of these things as your truth.
Name: Book 10

text: Some people will know right away, that what I have written constitutes their truth, while the majority will never question that which they have already been taught.
Name: Book 10

text: They have never inquired as to who writes the history, who writes the prevailing theology, or who decides what is or is not politically correct.
Name: Book 10

text: They havent a clue about who authorizes the publication of that which they are taught in the educational stems, because they have been taught what to think, rather than how to think.
Name: Book 10

text: Its much easier to go with the flow and accept what the majority accepts, than it is to question political, educational, or religious authority.
Name: Book 10

text: Although this was Lucifers world in ancient times, the same as it is now, it was not until the advent of Judaism and its offshoots, Islam and Christianity that humanity began to suffer constant sorrow through oppression, war and slaughter.
Name: Book 10

text: Forget about what youve been taught in school, or seen in movies, because the early Church being successful in its inquisition, wrote the history its way, and painted a picture of its enemies (particularly the Scandinavians) as being barbaric pagans who expressed their nature by raping, burning, pillaging and plundering the meek and passive Christians.
Name: Book 10

text: The untold story, however, has the inquisitors of the Christian faith raping, burning, pillaging and plundering the farmers and merchants of not only Norway, Sweden and Denmark, but wherever they went, in behalf of the god of this world, and doing it in the name of Jesus.
Name: Book 10

text: Viking is an Old Norse term for a raid.
Name: Book 10

text: After about seven hundred years of having their culture and its spiritual tradition decimated at the point of a Christian sword, these farmers and merchants went a Viking in defense of their homelands; but it was already too late.
Name: Book 10

text: Lucifer and his religious heroes with occult powers backing them won the day.
Name: Book 10

text: It is his world after all, and look at what a prize we have now.
Name: Book 10

text: Every time I hear someone Praying: Thy will be done, I cringe at the thought of what that might bring.
Name: Book 10

text: When I hear Christians in the patriot movement speak of giving this nation (America) back to god, I realize that the struggle for freedom is already lost.
Name: Book 10

text: Life has taught me over the years, that those who claim to be led either by god, Jesus or the Spirit, tend to use what they call gods will, to engage in all forms of treachery and deceit.
Name: Book 10

text: Being led in such a way, all too often serves as a mask for their indulgence of the lower emotional passions, and an opportunity to fleece those they consider to be their sheep.
Name: Book 10

text: Its my hope that I have been successful in explaining that which I had to present adequately enough, that most of your questions have been answered somewhere in this book.
Name: Book 10

text: I realize that such an expectation is unreasonable, however, so we have a place on the website for questions and answers, where further questions have been anticipated.
Name: Book 10

text: ABOUT THE AUTHOR Jon was born in the State of California in 1950, and grew up surfing, hitchhiking around the country, and studying the martial arts.
Name: Book 10

text: He earned a black belt by the age of 24, and then served in the army for a time.
Name: Book 10

text: He attended three universities studying Sociology, Psychology, and Clinical Nutrition.
Name: Book 10

text: Presently, he works in a family-owned business as an herbalist and clinical nutritionist.
Name: Book 10

text: Jon walked the path of six spiritual traditions for a period of ten years before learning of the ancient tradition practiced by the Indo-Europeans.
Name: Book 10

text: Having been in communication with his Higher Self since 1989, he was told to apply what he had learned esoterically, to reestablishing the esoteric principles in the Old Norse tradition that were lost.
Name: Book 10

text: The Vitkar carried the mysteries for that tradition, but when they were killed during the Inquisition, everything was destroyed, save a few fragments.
Name: Book 10

text: Jon spent another ten years studying the works of other researchers, and was eventually able to fulfill the wishes of his Higher Self.
Name: Book 10

text: Since 2007, he has engaged himself in pursuing knowledge regarding Dominion, whom he came across during his shamanic battles on other planes, and in other dimensions.
Name: Book 10

text: He is a man who believes in pursuing his own knowledge, rather than accepting what is handed to him.
Name: Book 10

text: Aunt Bev kept telling me it wasnt my fault.
Name: Book 10

text: But, if I had waited one more day before leaving to spend spring break with her in Alaska, I would have been home to pull my mother from the burning house.
Name: Book 10

text: I knew my aunt meant well, but it hadnt helped with my dreams for the past two weeks.
Name: Book 10

text: Or should I say nightmares.
Name: Book 10

text: As soon as I lay down and closed my eyes, the same scene filled my mind over and over again.
Name: Book 10

text: Almost like a memory.
Name: Book 10

text: I was in the woods just outside my house and helplessly watched a huge ferocious dog-like creature circling my house while it burned.
Name: Book 10

text: At first glance the animal appeared to be red, but as I continued to stare, the color of his fur shifted like that of dancing flames.
Name: Book 10

text: My childhood home was on fire and I looked helplessly on, listening to my mothers screams coming from somewhere inside.
Name: Book 10

text: I knew I had to save her, but I was afraid.
Name: Book 10

text: Mom, I screamed, and started to rush for the house when the beast noticed me and snarled.
Name: Book 10

text: I froze, unable to move.

frame.Frame: Cause  change  of  position  on  a  scale

Name: Book 10

text: His yellow eyes glowed as if they reflected the fire behind him and I saw his blood stained fangs.
Name: Book 10

text: I quickly ran away from the house.
Name: Book 10

text: Away from saving my mother from the hungry flames that consumed her.
Name: Book 10

text: I glanced to either side as I ran and could see the faint reddish glow of several other dogs through the trees.
Name: Book 10

text: They had joined the first dog in the pursuit of his prey.
Name: Book 10

text: My lungs burned as the woods ignited behind the dogs, forcing me to run faster or be consumed by the same fire that claimed my mothers life.
Name: Book 10

text: I skidded to a stop at the edge of a cliff and spun around to face the pack of wild beasts as one-by-one they emerged from the burning trees and approached me.
Name: Book 10

text: They appeared to be almost smiling.
Name: Book 10

text: I had two choices.
Name: Book 10

text: Each of them a death sentence.
Name: Book 10

text: I chose the latter and leaped from the cliff.
Name: Book 10

text: The dogs peered over the edge as I fell away from them.
Name: Book 10

text: They seemed disappointed with my choice.
Name: Book 10

text: As they moved away out of sight I looked below and saw the ground rushing up at me.
Name: Book 10

text: Right before impact I woke up and realized I was still falling.
Name: Book 10

text: I hit the hardwood floor beside my bed and cried out.
Name: Book 10

text: Today would be my first day at my new high school.
Name: Book 10

text: Aunt Bev didnt know it yet, but she would.
Name: Book 10

text: Between the nightmares and the twenty plus hours of sun I found it hard to sleep at all.
Name: Book 10

text: Reluctantly, I climbed out from under the four thick quilts that lined my wrought iron bed and stood in front of my pine wood closet, staring at all the new clothes Aunt Bev had bought for me.
Name: Book 10

text: I sighed heavily and dropped my shoulders.

frame.Frame: Cause  change  of  position  on  a  scale

Name: Book 10

text: My heart was full of sadness for my mom, and I needed to get out of the house and away from my aunt.
Name: Book 10

text: I loved her for everything she was trying to do, but she was beginning to suffocate me.
Name: Book 10

text: Determined to get out of the house, I flipped through the rack of new clothes, but ended up choosing a pair of my old jeans, my favorite long sleeve hooded tee-shirt, and my old red converse shoesall of which my mom had bought me.
Name: Book 10

text: The only new item I chose was a black parka Aunt Bev had picked out.
Name: Book 10

text: Shed insisted it was normal wear for all the residents of Haven, Alaska.
Name: Book 10

text: When I had tried it on at the Haven Mallthats code for the only general store within fifty milesI felt like a bubble wrapped package.
Name: Book 10

text: And Im pretty sure I looked like one, too.
Name: Book 10

text: After showering, I stared at my reflection.
Name: Book 10

text: My carrot red curls seemed brighter in the Alaskan light, so did my light blue eyes which made my already pale complexion take on a bluish hue.
Name: Book 10

text: I brushed my teeth, got dressed, but something was itching the back of my neck.
Name: Book 10

text: I knew it wasnt the tag inside my shirt, because it was an old shirt and I always cut the itchy ones out right away.
Name: Book 10

text: I went back into the bathroom, but when I pulled my hair up, there was nothing there.
Name: Book 10

text: I shrugged, and plucked the bubble wrap jacket from my bed before going downstairs.
Name: Book 10

text: I stopped at the bottom of the steps and gazed through the huge bay windows.
Name: Book 10

text: Outside reminded me of a Norman Rockwell painting my mother had hanging on the wall in our den.
Name: Book 10

text: Soft rolling hills casually dropping off into a small lake surrounded on three sides by large fir trees reaching for the sky.

frame.Frame: Cause  change  of  position  on  a  scale

Name: Book 10

text: A low fog hung just above the water like a blanket of soft cotton.
Name: Book 10

text: Gen, my aunt called, for the gazillionth time since Id gotten off the plane.
Name: Book 10

text: I rolled my eyes.
Name: Book 10

text: Aunt Bev was just setting a giant stack of pancakes on the table when I pushed through the kitchens swinging door.
Name: Book 10

text: I couldnt help but notice the muscles in her arm when she extended it to set the plate in front of me.
Name: Book 10

text: She glanced up and smiled.
Name: Book 10

text: Just then, my heart panged because she looked so much like my mom.
Name: Book 10

text: They both had dark hair and blue eyes and shared the same quirky smile.
Name: Book 10

text: Even though Aunt Bev was five years older than my mom, she seemed younger for some reason.
Name: Book 10

text: We ate in silence.
Name: Book 10

text: I pushed my fork around my plate trying to get up the nerve to tell her I wanted to go to school.
Name: Book 10

text: I wanted to go anywhere outside of this house.
Name: Book 10

text: I felt like a prisoner.
Name: Book 10

text: My mom hadnt been near as protective as Bev.
Name: Book 10

text: I felt her eyes on me, but I didnt look up.
Name: Book 10

text: Finally, I blurted out what was building inside of me.
Name: Book 10

text: I want to go to school.
Name: Book 10

text: Its senior year, Aunt Bev, I pleaded.
Name: Book 10

text: I thought we decided you would home school.
Name: Book 10

text: She paused then added.
Name: Book 10

text: The weather here can be very unforgiving, you know.
Name: Book 10

text: I rolled my eyes.
Name: Book 10

text: I dont care, I yelled and jumped from my seat.
Name: Book 10

text: I need to be around people.
Name: Book 10

text: I raked my plate in the garbage.
Name: Book 10

text: Come on, Aunt BevIm seventeen for Christs sake.
Name: Book 10

text: I started to pace trying to come up with some kind of rationalization that she wouldnt be able to argue with.
Name: Book 10

text: Then it hit me.
Name: Book 10

text: I think if I was at school every day I wouldnt think so much about mom.
Name: Book 10

text: Aunt Bev tucked her bangs behind her ear and stood.
Name: Book 10

text: I watched her face for any kind of telltale sign of what her answer might be.
Name: Book 10

text: She just stood still like a statue.
Name: Book 10

text: I kept saying over and over in my mind, say yes, say yes, say yes.
Name: Book 10

text: That quirky smile of hers suddenly spread across her face.
Name: Book 10

text: She said, and laughed light heartedly.
Name: Book 10

text: I screamed with delight and rushed around the table wrapping her in a hug and lifted her off the floor.
Name: Book 10

text: I didnt think about it at the time, but lifting her was like lifting my fork.
Name: Book 10

text: We pulled in front of the school.
Name: Book 10

text: The building didnt look at all like a school.
Name: Book 10

text: Instead, it reminded me of a large airplane hangar huddled in the middle of a few smaller ones.
Name: Book 10

text: I was totally relieved to see school had already started and the students were tucked in their classrooms somewherehopefully far away from view of the front office.
Name: Book 10

text: I exited Aunt Bevs Jeep and to my surprise I heard another door shut.
Name: Book 10

text: I quickly turned to look behind me.
Name: Book 10

text: Aunt Bev, wrapped up like an Indian papoose, had filed in behind me.
Name: Book 10

text: I gave her the old, Youve got to be joking look.
Name: Book 10

text: A bubble wrapped teenager and her blanket wrapped auntIll bet we made the handsome couple.
Name: Book 10

text: She asked, her forehead wrinkled with a frown.
Name: Book 10

text: I can register myself.
Name: Book 10

text: Like, noyou cant.
Name: Book 10

text: she answered in a teenagers mocking tone and out came that quirky smile of hers, again.
Name: Book 10

text: I shook my head and couldnt help but smile.
Name: Book 10

text: All right, I mumbled, not finding any humor in being treated like a twelve year old.
Name: Book 10

text: Another few minutes and Ill be freefor seven hours anyway.
Name: Book 10

text: When we entered the school it looked completely different than I had pictured.
Name: Book 10

text: There were doors on either side of the hall with lockers in between.
Name: Book 10

text: Aunt Bev pushed through the glass door marked office and I followed with my head down.
Name: Book 10

text: Once inside, we stepped to the long counter that split the office down the middle.
Name: Book 10

text: It surprised me when the lady behind the counter called Aunt Bev by name.
Name: Book 10

text: Why would she know her.
Name: Book 10

text: It wasnt like Aunt Bev had kids.
Name: Book 10

text: She had black hair a round face and high cheekbones.
Name: Book 10

text: She was wearing blue jeans and a neon pink shirt with a picture of a wolf screened on the front.
Name: Book 10

text: I immediately felt at home.
Name: Book 10

text: In my old school everybody over dressed.
Name: Book 10

text: Even the coach wore designer wind suits.
Name: Book 10

text: She didnt look like the mental image of an Eskimo Id always had.
Name: Book 10

text: I always pictured them with animal skin jackets, matching boots, ice hanging off their faces, and living in little igloos.
Name: Book 10

text: She and Aunt Bev talked for several minutes, apparently forgetting the reason they had gotten the chance for their visit in the first place.
Name: Book 10

text: When they both finally took a breath I saw my cue.
Name: Book 10

text: Umcan I get my schedule and go on to class.
Name: Book 10

text: Oh uh, of course.
Name: Book 10

text: Here you go Genevieve.
Name: Book 10

text: And heres a map.
Name: Book 10

text: She handed me a piece of paper with four lines and a few boxes on it.
Name: Book 10

text: I briefly glanced, and stuffed it into my pocket and looked her square in the eye.
Name: Book 10

text: Its Gen, I said flatly, then looked over my schedule, told Aunt Bev bye, and hurried out the door.
Name: Book 10

text: Im free, thank God, I mumbled under my breath as I strolled down the hall to find my English class.
Name: Book 10

text: According to the map my first class was all the way at the end of the second hallway, which to my surprise turned out to be a whole lot shorter that what it looked like on the paper.
Name: Book 10

text: With my jacket over one arm and my backpack thrown over my shoulder I took a deep breath, which did nothing to slow my climbing heart rate.
Name: Book 10

text: I entered the room, and all eyes were on me.
Name: Book 10

text: I thought I might hyperventilate on the spot.
Name: Book 10

text: Mr.
Name: Book 10

text: Donovan was short, bald, and his furrowed eyebrows said he was very perturbed that I had the nerve to show up in the middle of his class.
Name: Book 10

text: I cleared my throat and handed him the piece of paper from the office.
Name: Book 10

text: He looked down his nose through his little round glasses and squinted at the piece of paper before handing it back, along with a sheet of assignments.
Name: Book 10

text: Find a seat, Miss Labreck.
Name: Book 10

text: I turned and looked up.
Name: Book 10

text: The kids had already lost interest but I kept my eyes glued to the floor until I reached my desk in the next to last row.
Name: Book 10

text: After pouring over the essay list, I thought of my old essays at home and thought of my mom.
Name: Book 10

text: My eyes grew hot with tears.
Name: Book 10

text: I pretended to have something in my eye and rubbed at it with my fingers.
Name: Book 10

text: When the bell rangactually it sounded more like a loud grinding buzzer at the end of a basketball gameI waited until everyone filed out of the door before checking my schedule for my next embarrassment.
Name: Book 10

text: I sensed someone watching me and looked up.
Name: Book 10

text: Im Luna, the dark-haired girl said in a soft voice.
Name: Book 10

text: She was very pretty.
Name: Book 10

text: Long straight jet-black hair swept to one side, light brown skin that glowed against the bright overhead lights, and high cheekbones that pushed her eyes in an upward sweep.
Name: Book 10

text: When I stood, I was at least four inches taller.
Name: Book 10

text: Gen.
Name: Book 10

text: Wheres your next class.
Name: Book 10

text: she asked.
Name: Book 10

text: Chemistry, uh, somewhere, I said, and fumbled for my schedule.
Name: Book 10

text: We only have one chemistry teacher.
Name: Book 10

text: We talked along the way and she pointed out the library and lunchroom as we passed.
Name: Book 10

text: When she left me at the door to the chemistry lab, we made plans to meet at lunch.
Name: Book 10

text: I was glad there were no extra students for me to pair with in chemistry.
Name: Book 10

text: I got to work by myself, which was a good thing, because chemistry was not my strong subject and I didnt feel like making a fool out of myself on my first day.
Name: Book 10

text: By lunch, I was starting to relax a little.
Name: Book 10

text: I followed Luna through the line, and then we sat with a group of her friends.
Name: Book 10

text: She introduced them, but I instantly forgot their names as soon as she said them.
Name: Book 10

text: Sitting at the table lost in the cacophony of voices, I felt someones eyes on me.
Name: Book 10

text: I purposely dropped my fork on the floor and while leaning down to pick it up I looked behind me.
Name: Book 10

text: Across the room, I spotted three Indian boys sitting at a table by themselves.
Name: Book 10

text: All three had long black hair, tanned skin, and muscular bodies.
Name: Book 10

text: I kept looking around until I spotted the one whod been looking at me.
Name: Book 10

text: Dont ask me how I knew he was the onebecause he wasnt looking at me when I saw himbut I just did.
Name: Book 10

text: He was the most beautiful thing Id ever seen.
Name: Book 10

text: His disheveled russet color hair boasted reddish highlights shining under the lights, and his chiseled jaw-line defined his masculine facial features, and sort of pouty lips.
Name: Book 10

text: His eyes were a piercing green color, like the color of the Jamaican waters, and he knew how to use them to his advantage.
Name: Book 10

text: He wasnt all busting out with muscles either.
Name: Book 10

text: He was more on the lean side, but I plainly saw the muscles outlined in his tight shirt.
Name: Book 10

text: Even though he was sitting alone he must have heard something funny because I saw one side of his mouth curve up in a smile.
Name: Book 10

text: My heart drummed hyperactively and it was at that moment I knew I was going to be happy at my new school.
Name: Book 10

text: I wanted to throw my alarm clock through the window, but I didnt because I wasnt quite awake enough to move.

frame.Frame: Cause  change  of  position  on  a  scale

Name: Book 10

text: I had fought the urge to sleep as long as I could.
Name: Book 10

text: Every time I did fall asleep, the same nightmare returned.
Name: Book 10

text: It was as if someone repeatedly pushed rewind then play on a DVD player in my head.
Name: Book 10

text: The end result would be me waking up just as tired as when Id gone to sleep.
Name: Book 10

text: After a long hot shower I dressed and went downstairs to the kitchen.
Name: Book 10

text: To my surprise, Aunt Bev was gone.
Name: Book 10

text: Shed left a note and as soon as I read it I squealed with delight.
Name: Book 10

text: Shed had some early morning errands and had actually left me the keys to the jeep.
Name: Book 10

text: It didnt even much matter that the note said to come straight home from school and not to talk to strangers.
Name: Book 10

text: What am I like twelve.
Name: Book 10

text: And since I didnt really know anyone yet, where would I go.
Name: Book 10

text: It made my day not having to be dropped off with most of the kids still in the parking lot.
Name: Book 10

text: It was cold and rainy when I left for school, but it was still a freakin awesome day to me.
Name: Book 10

text: After I turned the key and the jeep fired up, a smile stretched across my face and was still there when I pulled into the schools parking lot.
Name: Book 10

text: I pulled into an empty space at the far corner of the lot.
Name: Book 10

text: I grabbed my backpack and put my hand on the door handle, suddenly feeling like I was being watched again.
Name: Book 10

text: When I pushed open my door and jumped down, I casually twisted around, scanning all the unfamiliar faces.
Name: Book 10

text: The same three boys Id seen in the lunchroom were hanging out under a giant fir tree of some kind.
Name: Book 10

text: Even though all three looked a lot alike, two of them looked identical.
Name: Book 10

text: They were laughing and talking, but I noticed the third one seemed to be staring a hole through me.
Name: Book 10

text: I raised my head and sort of smiled, only he didnt smile back.
Name: Book 10

text: He just promptly turned his attention to his friends.
Name: Book 10

text: I felt like a total moron.
Name: Book 10

text: My eyebrows furrowed and I stomped off toward the side door of the school.
Name: Book 10

text: I scanned the area around me looking for William.

text: Please.
