Name: Book 10

text: To hell with them, I grumbled.
Name: Book 10

text: The voice called out again and I followed it in the direction of the trees.
Name: Book 10

text: I stopped briefly and turned around.
Name: Book 10

text: Luna had one hand on her hip, pointing her finger in Joshuas face, and of course, they were still arguingabout me.
Name: Book 10

text: I wondered why they hadnt heard it, too.
Name: Book 10

text: Just before disappearing through the trees, I briefly looked over my shoulder, but kept going.
Name: Book 10

text: I followed the voice into a pass made of volcanic rock.
Name: Book 10

text: The moon cast its glow on trees growing all twisted up with barely any growth on them.
Name: Book 10

text: I suddenly wondered if Id made the right decision taking off, but I didnt feel threatened by the voice.
Name: Book 10

text: Climbing down a steep hill I noticed the temperature steadily drop.

frame.Frame: Cause  change  of  position  on  a  scale

Name: Book 10

text: By the time I reached the bottom the air was freezing cold and I felt a slight breeze.
Name: Book 10

text: The voice grew louder as I followed, and eventually I found myself entering a cave where every surface was made from ice.
Name: Book 10

text: It really freaked me out.
Name: Book 10

text: I mean, we were in the middle of a desert where the temperature during the day easily hit triple digits, and here Id only walked about a mile and was surrounded by ice.
Name: Book 10

text: When James had earlier mentioned the Ice Cave, I thought it was just the caves name.
Name: Book 10

text: I didnt know he had meant it literally.
Name: Book 10

text: I didnt think about it much.
Name: Book 10

text: I was so entranced by the voice, I couldnt focus on anything but finding it.
Name: Book 10

text: It was cold and completely dark.
Name: Book 10

text: I inched my way deeper inside, feeling my way along the ice covered walls.
Name: Book 10

text: The voice seemed like it was just in front of me, and when I felt my way around a turn, I saw a faint glow from somewhere up ahead.
Name: Book 10

text: My heart raced and my breathing came in short slow bursts when I saw a large dimly lit cavern.
Name: Book 10

text: Even though there was a small amount of light, I couldnt tell where it was coming from.
Name: Book 10

text: My heart fell when I saw a woman in the distance, lying on a stone table.
Name: Book 10

text: It was only when I got closer I could tell it was my mom.
Name: Book 10

text: I quickly rushed to her side.
Name: Book 10

text: Her eyes were closed and she appeared to be asleep.
Name: Book 10

text: I watched her delicate chest barely rise and fall.
Name: Book 10

text: I looked on in disbelief.
Name: Book 10

text: My vision immediately blurred from tears.
Name: Book 10

text: I shook her, but she didnt move.
Name: Book 10

text: The voice came again, soft and clear.
Name: Book 10

text: Genevieve, although she cannot hear you, you can save her.
Name: Book 10

text: The voice spoke to me.
Name: Book 10

text: I looked all around.
Name: Book 10

text: How can I save her.
Name: Book 10

text: I asked with desperation.
Name: Book 10

text: You can save heryou can save them all.
Name: Book 10

text: But, you must be brave and willing to do things you never imagined.
Name: Book 10

text: Your path will not be an easy one.
Name: Book 10

text: The voice echoed softly.
Name: Book 10

text: I screamed, wiping away my tears with the backs of both hands.
Name: Book 10

text: Mom, wake up, I pleaded, shaking her hard.
Name: Book 10

text: We have to get out of here now.
Name: Book 10

text: Genevieve, you must listen.
Name: Book 10

text: Your mother did not die in the fire.
Name: Book 10

text: Hurry Genevieve, only you can save her.
Name: Book 10

text: Gen, where are you.
Name: Book 10

text: I spun around and saw a light coming toward the cavern.
Name: Book 10

text: Were in here, Luna.
Name: Book 10

text: Just as the flashlight beam got close, the chamber light went out and Luna rushed in.

text: I found her, Luna.
Name: Book 10

text: I found my mom.
Name: Book 10

text: I smiled through tears.
Name: Book 10

text: Theres nobody in here but us, Luna said, shining the flash light around the empty room.
Name: Book 10

text: I peered at the empty table, and then grabbed the flashlight from Lunas hand.
Name: Book 10

text: I shined the light on the empty table.
Name: Book 10

text: She was right here, andand there was a voice.
Name: Book 10

text: It told me how she didnt die in the fire but was kidnapped by Zane.
Name: Book 10

text: The voice said he has her.
Name: Book 10

text: Why did you run away.
Name: Book 10

text: Youre not listening to me.
Name: Book 10

text: I didnt run away.
Name: Book 10

text: A voice led me here, and I found my mom right there on the table.
Name: Book 10

text: I pointed at the empty table.
Name: Book 10

text: The quest has changed now.
Name: Book 10

text: I ran toward the cave entrance, and Luna was on my heels.
Name: Book 10

text: Where are you going, Gen.
Name: Book 10

text: What are you talking about.
Name: Book 10

text: Zane has my mom, and Im going to find herwith or without help from you and your brothers.
Name: Book 10

text: I ran right into Joseph when I exited the cave, only he wasnt alone.
Name: Book 10

text: James and Joshua were also there.
Name: Book 10

text: I tried to push away from him, but I was so hysterical he couldnt understand what I was trying to say, and he just held me tightly.
Name: Book 10

text: Luna came out a minute later rubbing her hip.
Name: Book 10

text: She had slipped and fallen on the icy floor.
Name: Book 10

text: Any other time we would have probably had a good laugh, but not now, not after what Luna told them.
Name: Book 10

text: I have a new quest now.
Name: Book 10

text: I have to find out where Zane is hiding my mom, I screamed, and fought to get away from Joseph.
Name: Book 10

text: What are you talking about.
Name: Book 10

text: My mom was in the cave, only she wasnt in the cave.
Name: Book 10

text: I stared at Joseph with pleading eyes.
Name: Book 10

text: I know it sounds crazy, but I saw her, and she didnt die in the fireZane took her.
Name: Book 10

text: What do you mean your quest has changed.
Name: Book 10

text: Gen, if we dont find the crest and take it back to the throne, Zane wins.
Name: Book 10

text: Joseph stared into my eyes, and he looked confused and hurt.
Name: Book 10

text: He was squeezing my arms too tightly, but I didnt care.
Name: Book 10

text: My mom isnt dead.
Name: Book 10

text: I have to find her.
Name: Book 10

text: I tried to pull away.
Name: Book 10

text: Where will you go to find her.
Name: Book 10

text: You dont even know where Zane is.
Name: Book 10

text: You know where he is, and you can take me, I replied.
Name: Book 10

text: He wont, Gen, Joshua snapped.
Name: Book 10

text: My gazed shifted between Joseph and Joshua.
Name: Book 10

text: Yes he will, James, I said, then peered at Joseph.
Name: Book 10

text: Tell him you will take me to Zanes hideout, I pleaded.
Name: Book 10

text: Joseph released his grip on my arms.
Name: Book 10

text: His lowered his eyes toward the ground, and shook his head.
Name: Book 10

text: He turned his back to me and walked away.
Name: Book 10

text: Hell kill her if I dont find herplease.
Name: Book 10

text: I collapsed to the ground, leaning back on my knees, sobbing uncontrollably.
Name: Book 10

text: Joshua pulled me to my feet, and spoke softly.
Name: Book 10

text: Hes going to kill her anyway.
Name: Book 10

text: He had this super sad look on his face.
Name: Book 10

text: But, if we get the crest, maybe we can use it as a bargaining tool to get your mom back.
Name: Book 10

text: Luna wrapped her arm around my shoulders.
Name: Book 10

text: It sounds like our best option.
Name: Book 10

text: When the time comes, how do I know youll keep your word.
Name: Book 10

text: My gaze shifted between Luna and her brothers.
Name: Book 10

text: Because, I give you my word.
Name: Book 10

text: Joseph stepped in front of his brothers.
Name: Book 10

text: If it comes down to Zane releasing your mom in exchange for the crest, Ill personally give it to him.
Name: Book 10

text: They all peered at me, waiting for an answer.
Name: Book 10

text: I let out a deep sigh and dropped my shoulders.

frame.Frame: Cause  change  of  position  on  a  scale

Name: Book 10

text: I said, trying to hide my trepidation.
Name: Book 10

text: All right, you guys.
Name: Book 10

text: Keep your eyes and ears open in here.
Name: Book 10

text: I doubt Zane is planning to let us take the crest and just walk out, James said, leading the way.
Name: Book 10

text: I hadnt paid attention to all the different passageways when I entered the cave the first time.
Name: Book 10

text: I had a hard time concentrating.
Name: Book 10

text: All I could think about was my mom being alive, and I couldnt wait to get home and tell Aunt Bev.
Name: Book 10

text: James asked, stopping and turning to the rest of us.
Name: Book 10

text: Stay alert, he whispered as evenly as he could before he started walking again.
Name: Book 10

text: Between the lingering adrenaline of seeing my mother, and my heart starting to race with fear, I knew something was about to happen.
Name: Book 10

text: I just didnt know what or where, but I could have probably guessed if I really tried.
Name: Book 10

text: I watched James shine the flashlight up toward the ceiling as the passageway opened to a large cavern.
Name: Book 10

text: Did I say large.
Name: Book 10

text: The ceiling was at least four stories high, and the entire room was covered in ice.
Name: Book 10

text: James shined the light at some markings visible behind the ice.
Name: Book 10

text: I know this is the right room, but I dont see anything resembling a crest.
Name: Book 10

text: Luna and I started across the cavern.
Name: Book 10

text: At first, we didnt see anything either.
Name: Book 10

text: But when she swung the light across the far wall, a sparkle caught my eye.
Name: Book 10

text: Theres nothing here, Luna called out.
Name: Book 10

text: Wait a minute, I said, grabbing the flashlight from her.
Name: Book 10

text: I rushed over to the far wall.
Name: Book 10

text: Just underneath a layer of ice I saw what appeared to be a large tomb.
Name: Book 10

text: How are we going to break through the ice.
Name: Book 10

text: Joshua threw his hands up.
Name: Book 10

text: I guess well have to go outside and find some sharp rocks to beat against the ice, Joseph said, dismayed.
Name: Book 10

text: If we do that, we might break the crest, and then it will be of no use to us, James replied severely.
Name: Book 10

text: The back of my neck starting heating up again.
Name: Book 10

text: At first, I didnt think anything about it.
Name: Book 10

text: But it kept growing hotter, much hotter than before.
Name: Book 10

text: Without saying anything, I placed my hand against the back of my neck for a few seconds, then reached out and touched the back of Josephs hand.
Name: Book 10

text: He jumped up from his crouched position, and rubbed his hand.
Name: Book 10

text: Damn itwhat was that.
Name: Book 10

text: Luna shined the flash light on his hand, displaying a burn mark across it.
Name: Book 10

text: I had already placed my hand back on my neck, and moved in front of the wall.
Name: Book 10

text: I allowed it to heat up as long as I could stand it, then placed my hand against the ice directly over the crest.
Name: Book 10

text: The ice promptly began to melt and run down the wall.
Name: Book 10

text: How are you doing that.
Name: Book 10

text: I just smiled, because the truth was, I didnt know.
Name: Book 10

text: It really made me think though.
Name: Book 10

text: As much as I had fought against coming, and doubted everything Lunas grandfather had told me, having the ability to melt the ice brought it all together.
Name: Book 10

text: Maybe it really was my destiny to take the throne as the princess.
Name: Book 10

text: Luna shined her light on the melted area of the wall, and I pulled the crest loose.
Name: Book 10

text: As soon as I touched the metal and stone a strange feeling surged through my whole body, taking my breath away.

text: I wasnt prepared for what happened next.
Name: Book 10

text: A strong gust of wind swirled through the room.
Name: Book 10

text: I found myself encased in the middle of a whirlwind.
Name: Book 10

text: Images flashed through my mind, then, as quickly as it came it was gone.
Name: Book 10

text: Luna and her brothers were all staring wide eyed at me.
Name: Book 10

text: I asked, overcome with fear.
Name: Book 10

text: They remained perfectly still and silent.
Name: Book 10

text: What are you all staring at.
Name: Book 10

text: I pleaded for someone to answer.
Name: Book 10

text: I was about to fall apart when Joseph finally found his voice.
Name: Book 10

text: Um, he uttered, and cocked his head a little to one side, and smiled faintly.
Name: Book 10

text: His expression faltered, and he lowered his eyes.
Name: Book 10

text: It promptly became obvious I wasnt going to get an answer, straight or otherwise, from Joseph.
Name: Book 10

text: I turned to face Luna.
Name: Book 10

text: She had that same bewildered look on her face, which made me even more confused.
Name: Book 10

text: The longer she stared, the more her mouth gaped open.
Name: Book 10

text: Have you all lost your will to speak.
Name: Book 10

text: Whats wrong with me.
Name: Book 10

text: I started to cry, and Joseph couldnt stand it.
Name: Book 10

text: Please dont cry, Gen.
Name: Book 10

text: Its just thatyouve changed.
Name: Book 10

text: He suddenly looked embarrassed and lowered his eyes.

text: Okay, now Im really starting to freak out.
Name: Book 10

text: Would somebody please talk to me so I can try to make sense of this whole thing.
Name: Book 10

text: Joshua and James had been staring at the floor the whole time like they were afraid to look at me.
Name: Book 10

text: Did something really happen when I touched the stone.
Name: Book 10

text: Maybe thats why it had been hidden behind the ice for so long.
Name: Book 10

text: Maybe no one was meant to find it because it was cursed.
Name: Book 10

text: Look at your skin, Gen.
Name: Book 10

text: Its its so flawless, it seems to be glowing almost.
Name: Book 10

text: When I pushed a piece of loose hair behind my ear, I noticed how silky it felt.
Name: Book 10

text: Not just soft either, it really felt like silk.
Name: Book 10

text: My heart suddenly raced out of control.
Name: Book 10

text: I ran my hand across my arm and it startled me, and I quickly jerked it away.
Name: Book 10

text: I had never felt skin so extremely soft that wasnt on a baby.
Name: Book 10

text: Youre suddenly more beautiful than anything Ive ever seen.
Name: Book 10

text: Its like you take my breath away.
Name: Book 10

text: Joseph was in awe.
Name: Book 10

text: I think you guys stayed out in the sun too long.
Name: Book 10

text: Im no different than I was ten minutes ago.
Name: Book 10

text: Youre wrong.
Name: Book 10

text: Joseph turned and started across the room.
Name: Book 10

text: I followed him to a spot on the other side of the room where the ice covered a green mossy area giving it a mirrored effect.
Name: Book 10

text: My knees grew increasingly weak and I trembled, staring at my reflection.
Name: Book 10

text: My whole outward appearance had changed.
Name: Book 10

text: I appeared to be slightly taller, my hair was longer, my features were way softer, my body had the great hour glass shape, even my breasts were larger.

text: I was definitely okay with that part.
Name: Book 10

text: I stepped up for a closer look.
Name: Book 10

text: My eyes were definitely darker.
Name: Book 10

text: Growing up they had always been a washed out blue color, then I noticed them taking on a greenish hue.
Name: Book 10

text: But now they were clearly a dark shade of green.
Name: Book 10

text: When I turned around, Luna, Joshua, and Joseph had joined James, and they were bowing before me.

text: A burning flush flew over me.
Name: Book 10

text: Get up, you guys.

text: They didnt move at first, but then slowly, they all stood.
Name: Book 10

text: You truly are the Adlet princess.
Name: Book 10

text: We are your servants, All four spoke in unison, and it gave me goose bumps.
Name: Book 10

text: Even though I had known very little about life, I was preparing to give it up in exchange for something I didnt truly understand.
Name: Book 10

text: I now knew more than ever, it was my calling.
Name: Book 10

text: I rolled my eyes, trying to hide my amusement.
Name: Book 10

text: Im just an ordinary teenage girl.
Name: Book 10

text: I turned toward the passageway, but spun back around.
Name: Book 10

text: Well maybe not ordinary, but still a teenage girl.
Name: Book 10

text: Now, can we please get outta here.
Name: Book 10

text: Im getting creeped out.
Name: Book 10

text: I waited allowing James to take the lead, then I stepped in line next to Luna, looping my arm through hers and smiling.
Name: Book 10

text: I started thinking about everything that had happened so far during this journey.
Name: Book 10

text: No matter what had happened, Luna had been nothing but patient and kind.
Name: Book 10

text: Not to mention how shed stuck up for me when they were arguing.
Name: Book 10

text: I had been so self absorbed, and worried about my feelings and what I was giving up, I never stopped to think about what all of this had meant for them.
Name: Book 10

text: Luna and her brothers were giving up everything to protect me, even if it meant them dying, and I hadnt bothered to thank any of them.
Name: Book 10

text: She covered my hand with hers and gave a gentle squeeze.
Name: Book 10

text: In turn I nudged her with my hip, a little too hard I might add, and she sort of bounced off the ice wall.
Name: Book 10

text: What made me feel so bad about it was that was the same hip shed walked out of the cave rubbing earlier after she had slipped on the ice.
Name: Book 10

text: But, being the awesome person Luna was, she just giggled.
Name: Book 10

text: Her hip had actually healed within minutes of falling, but I kept forgetting about that part.
Name: Book 10

text: We made it out of the cave without a hitch, and I smiled just starting to relax when James stopped abruptly and held up his hand.
Name: Book 10

text: When she grabbed my arm another vision shot through me.
Name: Book 10

text: It was the same man and he was dragging something.
Name: Book 10

text: The next thing I knew, they were all facing outward from a tight circle they made around me.

text: Coyotes lunged at us from every direction.

text: Some even jumped off the rocks high above us.
Name: Book 10

text: James and Joshua were the two fastest at transforming.

text: In wolf form it was impossible to distinguish one from the other.
Name: Book 10

text: They both had beautiful reddish-brown fur.
Name: Book 10

text: His deep red fur with silver tips was even more beautiful than that of his brothers.
Name: Book 10

text: Although Luna was a faster runner than her brothers, she was the slowest to transform.
Name: Book 10

text: Her fur was silver with deep red tipsthe exact opposite of Joseph.
Name: Book 10

text: It was strange I hadnt noticed it before.
Name: Book 10

text: Luna called out to me in my mind.
Name: Book 10

text: I had been entranced by their beauty, and had forgotten to focus.
Name: Book 10

text: Her call came too late.
Name: Book 10

text: A huge coyote jumped onto my back.
Name: Book 10

text: My back arched inward when his razor sharp claws dig into my flesh, sending me to the ground.

text: I heard his teeth gnashing at the back of my head, and suddenly his weight lifted off of me.

text: I quickly rolled and  by the time my feet and hands hit the ground Id transformed without even thinking about it.
Name: Book 10

text: I heard a fierce thunderous growl come out of nowhere and was shocked when I realized it had come from me.
Name: Book 10

text: Being greatly outnumbered didnt faze us.
Name: Book 10

text: We were much larger, much stronger, and much faster.
Name: Book 10

text: Hungry for blood, the five of us tore through the pack of coyotes.
Name: Book 10

text: In just minutes most of them were dead, and the ones that werent, cowered and ran away to hide in the mountains.
Name: Book 10

text: Unfortunately, the worst wasnt over.
Name: Book 10

text: Actually, the worst was just beginning.
Name: Book 10

text: Ascending from the mountain was a large pack of lycanZanes henchmen.

text: Their disheveled and splotchy fur covered bodies revealed they had battled many times before.
Name: Book 10

text: They were skinny and seemed undernourished, but I knew not to be fooled by their appearance.
Name: Book 10

text: The closer they inched toward us, the more they snarled, gnashing their teeth and growling.

text: James and Joshua slowly backed up to stand next to us by the mouth of the cave.

text: Adrenaline surged through my body, making it hard to keep still.
Name: Book 10

text: We stood our ground and waited.
Name: Book 10

text: As their pack neared, they split apart.
Name: Book 10

text: My heart raced uncontrollably when I saw an extremely largebigger than ussolid black Werewolf.
Name: Book 10

text: His fur was short and slick, and the moon reflected off his back.
Name: Book 10

text: His fangs were extremely long, but pearly white.
Name: Book 10

text: When I looked in his eyes I quietly gasped, and my heart nearly skipped a beat.
Name: Book 10

text: His eyes were not only large, somewhat angular, and black as coal, but they were pure evil as well.
Name: Book 10

text: He slowly sauntered toward me, and all three brothers quickly moved between us blocking his path, which evidently was what he wanted.

frame.Frame: Cause  change  of  position  on  a  scale

Name: Book 10

text: While their focus was on him, the bushes behind us exploded with a dozen more lycan.
Name: Book 10

text: Luna was so fast, she had ripped out the throats of two lycan before the others knew what happened.
Name: Book 10

text: Joseph wasnt as fast as his sister, but he was extremely strong.
Name: Book 10

text: When two lycan jumped him simultaneously, he clawed and chomped until both lycan bodies lay in a mass of blood and flesh on the ground after being twisted and ripped to shreds.
Name: Book 10

text: James and Joshua lunged at the larger one, but his pack quickly swarmed them.
Name: Book 10

text: They both took on two and three at a time, but began tiring.
Name: Book 10

text: Joseph went to help, leaving Luna to help me escape to safety.
Name: Book 10

text: Without me to assist Luna, they took her down quickly.
Name: Book 10

text: I heard her call out to me, but I couldnt answer.
Name: Book 10

text: I had made the mistake of looking into the larger ones eyes, and had fallen under his spell.
Name: Book 10

text: I couldnt move, and even though I was screaming on the inside, I couldnt scream out.
Name: Book 10

text: All I could do was continue to stare into his eyes while Luna screamed from somewhere behind.
Name: Book 10

text: I watched helplessly as he leaped through the air, and everything suddenly faded to black.
Name: Book 10

text: When I came to, everything was extremely fuzzy at first.
Name: Book 10

text: It was like my memory was wrapped in fog that was slowly lifting.
Name: Book 10

text: It was still dark, but I could tell by the twisted growing pattern of the trees around us we were headed back through Devils Pass.
Name: Book 10

text: Suddenly, the panic of what had happened surged through my veins, and when my heart started pounding I felt this really intense pain in my head.
Name: Book 10

text: Put me down, I yelled after looking at the face of the man carrying me.

text: I mean he wasnt ugly by any means, but I was sure he was the one who had tried to kill us.
Name: Book 10

text: As you wish, he said, speaking in a low even tone with a hint of a foreign accent.

text: He promptly slammed me onto the ground, knocking the wind out of me.
Name: Book 10

text: I looked up at his face.
Name: Book 10

text: The moonlight illuminated most of his features.
Name: Book 10

text: He appeared to be quite young.
Name: Book 10

text: His features seemed smooth yet firm.
Name: Book 10

text: He had jet-black hair, a chiseled jaw line and a short pointed beard.
Name: Book 10

text: He stood over me with an ominous look on his face.
Name: Book 10

text: Did you obtain the crest, Genevieve.
Name: Book 10

text: He moved extremely close to me, and stared down.

text: I tried to play dumb, but I think my face told the truth.
Name: Book 10

text: Dont think I am stupid.
Name: Book 10

text: It would prove to be a grave mistake on your part.
Name: Book 10

text: I know why you came hereto find the tomb of the Adlet woman.

text: I thought about everything that had happened in the cave once I touched the crest.
Name: Book 10

text: Maybe hed never seen me before I found it, so he wouldnt notice the changes Id gone through after removing the crest from the tombs lid.

text: I furrowed my brow, trying to hide my fear.
Name: Book 10

text: I dont know what youre talking about.
Name: Book 10

text: Now where are my friends.
Name: Book 10

text: I asked while getting up.
Name: Book 10

text: He said in a tone that sounded like he was pleased with himself for whatever reason.

text: If they were dead, I doubt seriously he had lifted a finger to do the actual killing.
Name: Book 10

text: He definitely struck me as someone who used others to do his bidding.
Name: Book 10

text: I narrowed my eyes.
Name: Book 10

text: If youve hurt them in any way, Ill kill you myself.

text: Ha.
Name: Book 10

text: I seriously doubt that young lady.

text: I moved dangerously close to him.

frame.Frame: Cause  change  of  position  on  a  scale

Name: Book 10

text: I moved even closer, tilting my head back as I came within inches from him.

text: He was a good bit taller than me, and even though he did frighten me, I wasnt about to let it show.

text: Whats to keep me from transforming and killing you right now.

text: He tilted his head, glowering at me for a long moment, an evil smile stretched across his face.
Name: Book 10

text: He leaned forward until his nose almost touched mine.
Name: Book 10

text: Because, your mother will die, he whispered, paused for effect, then let out an eerie laugh.
Name: Book 10

text: His voice echoed off the mountains around us.
Name: Book 10

text: My mom is dead so I highly doubt you can do anything at this point.
Name: Book 10

text: But you are wrong, Genevieve.

text: Camilla did not die in the fire.
Name: Book 10

text: She is very much alive, he said in a low growl.
Name: Book 10

text: I spun around and saw the serious look on his face.
Name: Book 10

text: How did he know about the fire.
Name: Book 10

text: What if he was telling the truth and my mom wasnt dead.
Name: Book 10

text: My heart immediately started aching, and I had to fight to keep from crying.

text: I already knew a lot about it from the girls I hung around, but my mom insisted on explaining it anyway.
Name: Book 10

text: She was really cool about the whole thing too, not like some of my friends moms had been.
Name: Book 10

text: She didnt even try to tell me sex was bad or anything like that.
Name: Book 10

text: She told me that sex was for two people who were truly in love and when I really did fall in love I would know.
Name: Book 10

text: She explained how when your heart aches for him and when you feel like you cant breathe without him, or you think about his feelings more than you think about your own, thats true love.
Name: Book 10

text: What she said had really clicked with me, and I guess thats why I never had sex.
Name: Book 10

text: I never felt that way about anyoneuntil I met William.
Name: Book 10

text: He opened my door and I stepped down, but didnt make eye contact at first.

text: I suddenly felt very self conscious about my outfit, and I tried to pull my jacket closed.
Name: Book 10

text: When William didnt speak, I looked up.

text: He had a strange look on his face, and his jaw hung open.

text: I asked, searching his eyes.

text: I look stupid, dont I.

text: I flushed with embarrassment.
Name: Book 10

text: Uh, he trailed off, and a huge smile covered his face.
Name: Book 10

text: My God, Genevieveyoure the most beautiful girl I have ever seen, he said sincerely, his eyes danced over me.

text: He just stood frozen in front of me, like he was completely in awe.
Name: Book 10

text: Are we going to hang out in the driveway all night or,.
Name: Book 10

text: I trailed off, and smiled.
Name: Book 10

text: Lets go inside, he said happily, and placed his hand on the small of my back, guiding me to the door.
Name: Book 10

text: He unlocked the door and pushed it open, leading me inside.

text: When he flipped a switch and the foyer light came on, my eyes about popped out of my head.

text: You said you and your dad had a cabin on the lake, I said, doing air quotes for cabin while slowly checking out the room.
Name: Book 10

text: Technically it is a cabin, he said trying to act serious.

text: He pointed to one of the outer walls made from stacked logs.
Name: Book 10

text: Seeits made from real logs, so that qualifies it as a cabin.
Name: Book 10

text: He cocked his head to one side and shrugged his shoulders while holding out both arms, palm up, trying to smile innocently.

text: You are so full of crap, William Novak.
Name: Book 10

text: You know this is far from a regular cabin.
Name: Book 10

text: I had my hands on my hips, and furrowed my brow, but he knew I was only pretending to be angry.
Name: Book 10

text: The living room was more beautiful than I could have imagined.
Name: Book 10

text: It was a huge open room with a big overstuffed sectional couch on one side, facing a fireplace made from river-rock.
Name: Book 10

text: The side facing the lake boasted tinted glass from the floor all the way up to the two story ceiling.
Name: Book 10

text: On the other side of the room was a large bar area, pool table, some arcade style games, and the biggest flat panel television I had ever seen.
Name: Book 10

text: There was even a small row of slot machines.
Name: Book 10

text: William showed me the rest of the house which consisted of a gourmet style kitchen with a large breakfast nook, a formal dining room, five upstairs bedrooms and bathrooms, and a master suite on the main floor complete with its own deck and Jacuzzi.
Name: Book 10

text: After the tour, he asked me if I wanted anything to drink, but I declined since I wasnt sure if vampires ate or drink anything; I mean, besides blood.

text: William took my hand and lead me over to the couch.

text: Why are you here, Genevieve.

text: He had to have felt my hand trembling inside his.

text: I wanted to see you, thats all, I said, nervously.

text: He released my hand, and scooted away.

text: I started chewing on the inside of my lip.

text: Why does it have to be anything.

text: I asked severely, turning away from him so he wouldnt see my tears.

text: He sensed it or something, because I felt his hand wrap around my waist.

text: He pulled me in close, but I still wouldnt look at him.

text: If you tell me nothing is going on, Ill believe you, he whispered softly.

text: I felt an aching in my chest and my eyes stung.

text: Its not the kind of person I was.

text: He lifted my chin, gently forcing me to face him.
